40026040	Yesus naflurut munuk ma newal ia, na Ni tamata itelu i rfatuang Ia yai rtub-lufa roak. Ba nfalak verin Petrus ne, “Wol mtyahang nala jam isa vali ma fyatuang Ya'a ma tsi'ik wadida ma lolin?
40026041	Msyi'ik wabira ma lolin ovu miflurut, boma nitdawan deka nlabir nala mia ma myotu salasilan. Mia ralabira rfalak ma myotu afa lolin, na'uk wol myot-nala, tevek myafun da'in.”
40026042	Nata Yesus nti ewal vali ma naflurut. Ia nfalak ne, “Bapa, wean i mtorung ma uvara wawa'uk ini, na wean watan i ralam a nfalak a!”
40026043	Naflurut munuk ma newal Ia, na Ni tamata itelu yai rtuba watan obin, tevek matarira ra raswosu da'in roak.
40026044	Ba nsi'ik watan ma rtuba inyai, na nti ewal ma naflurut nala fatelu roak. Ia naflurut wean inlangin a.
40026045	Nata nma ma ntuan ewal Ni tamata itelu yai. Ia nfalak verin ira ne, “Mtyuba watan obin? Eka msyi'ik Ning amar a naran roak ma rala Ya'a Tamata Yanan verin tamata salasilan ra.
40026046	Byatar ma tati kikyai. Eka msyi'ik! Tamata i mane nfedi Ya'a nma ma sarseri roak.”
40026047	Na'ut i Yesus nangrihi obin, na Yudas i ntali Ni tamata vutu rahin irua yai nma. Tamata rivun ovi rtaha nahin blawat ovu rira navnaval ra rban-orang vali ia. Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu dawan Yahudi ra rsinir ira ma rti inyai.
40026048	Yudas i nfedi Yesus nfalak lan roak verin tamata rivun avyai ne, veka notu faneak. Faneak yai wean ini: “Tamata i uvoan Ia yai, Ia hi inyai i. Ba mtyaha lahir Ia ma myovun Ia ovu msyi'ik ma lolin Ia.”
40026049	Ba ti nfaseri lahir Yesus ma nfalak verin Ia ne, “Oo Tuan Guru.” Nata nvoan Ia.
40026050	Yesus nfalak verin ia ne, “Kida, motu kikyai afa ovi ralam nfalak a.” Ba tamata avyai rti rtaha lahir Ia.
40026051	Tamata isa i norang vali Yesus ntavar ni nahin blawat a ma nafat vatuk lahir Yahudi rira Mela Falurut Ila'a ni tamata sansinir isa arun a.
40026052	Yesus nfalak verin Ni tamata yai ne, “Ma'adoru ewal nahin blawat yai na'a ni tlanan a, tevek wean i iki nsingarahi ovu nahin blawat, na veka nmata vali ovu nahin blawat.
40026053	Mia wol mkya'a ne, Ya'a bis watan ma era verin Yamang a ma nlobang Ya'a? Bis watan ma era verin Ia ma nsinir lahir Ni sansinir ra tali lanit ratan, na'a sidovung dawan nlia tali vutu rahin irua, ma rma.
40026054	Na'uk wean i Ubu notu wean inyai ma nlobang Ya'a, na wean inba ma nfakena lahir afa ovi rfadoku roak na'a Surat Ralan a, na'a Ning matmatan a?”
40026055	Na'ut inyai, na Yesus nfalak verin tamata rivun avyai ne, “Mia beta mnyari ne Ya'a ini tamata ktufan Ya'a, ma mya lahir ovu bira nahin blawat ra ovu navnaval ra ma mtyaha Ya'a? Lokat amar, na mryea Ya'a udoku ma usiair na'a Rahan Dawan Falurut, na'uk wol mtyaha Ya'a.
40026056	Na'uk ma wean urun ini, boma nfakena lahir afa ovi nabi ra rfadoku roak na'a Surat Ralan a.” Nata Ni tamata ra munuk rafla talik Ia.
40026057	Tamata avyai rtaha roak Yesus, beti rovun Ia rti Yahudi rira Mela Falurut Ila'a, naran Kayafas, ni rahan a ma ndiri wahan ralan a. Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra ovu dawan Yahudi ra rasdovu roak ira na'a inyai.
40026058	Petrus nban-orang Yesus tali raroa watan, nata ti naran Mela Falurut Ila'a yai ni lean a. Tamata avyai rovun roak Yesus rati lean ralan. Petrus ndoku watan ovu tamata ovi rwanar wan yai, ma al nanaban ne, veka rotu Yesus wean inba.
40026059	Dawan Mela Falurut ra, ovu dawan fareta Yahudi ovi rdoku na'a rira sidovung dawan yai rdava tamata boku ma rala vaivatul siklabir al rfasala Yesus, boma rukun Ia ma nmata.
40026060	Na'uk wol rtuan Ni sala isa vali, velik ne tamata rivun rma ma rfalak rira afa siklabir ra na'a Yesus. Ti nata tamata siklabir irua rma ma rfalak ne,
40026061	“Tamata ini nfalak ne, ‘Ya'a bis a'ar vatuk Ubu Ni Rahan Dawan Falurut a, ma na'a amar itelu, na veka ufadiri ewal ia.’ ”
40026062	Ba Mela Falurut Ila'a ndiri ma norat Yesus ne, “Notu afakinimi wol mlotar tenam a, ma fwalak na'a afa ovi tamata avyai rfalak a?”
40026063	Na'uk Yesus wol vain. Ba Mela Falurut Ila'a nfalak verin Ia ne, “Ya'a ufalak verin Oa ne, Ubu i nva'at a nrenar afa ovi fwalak ra, ba fwalak urun verin ami! Oa ini Raja i veka mtevut tamata ra rira salasilan ra? Oa ini Ubu Yanan a?”
40026064	Yesus nfalak ne, “Wean i fwalak roak yai. Na'uk ufalak verin mia ne, tali amar ini vali, na veka msyi'ik Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a ini, udoku Ubu i nfareta munuk afakataka Ni lihir mela a, ovu veka utali lanit ma una'a mutan ratan ra uma.”
40026065	Ba Mela Falurut Ila'a nangrova urun ma nkamadir ni ravit blawat a. Ba nfalak ne, “Ia nfalak sian Ubu, tevek nfalak ne, Ubu Yanan Ia. Wol tperlu ma tdava tamata liak roak ma rfalak ni sala ra. Mia ka'i mryenar afa sian i nfalak a.
40026066	Ba minovak ma wean inba?” Ira rfalak ne, “Musti rukun Ia ma nmata!”
40026067	Nata tamata boku rafnit na'a wahan ralan a ovu raskevu tia ma watan Ia. Boku rvaval vali Ia ovu rfalak ne,
40026068	“Hoi, Oa ini Raja i veka mtevut tamata ra rira sala silan ra? Wean i nabi Oa, na eka fwalak verin ami ne, abovi rvaval Oa ini!”
40026069	Amar yai, na Petrus ndoku watan lean obin. Mela Falurut Ila'a ni vata sansinir isa nma ma nfalak verin Petrus ne, “Oa ba'i morang vali Yesus, tamata Galilea eri.”
40026070	Na'uk Petrus nalak ia na'a tamata rivun avyai waharira ralan ra ne, “Ya'a wol uka'a afa i fwalak yai.”
40026071	Petrus ti ma ndiri tembok dawan ni falfolat ngoran a, na Mela Falurut Ila'a ni vata sansinir liak isa vali nrea ia ma nfalak verin tamata ovi rna'a inyai ne, “Tamata ini ba'i norang Yesus tamata Nazaret eri.”
40026072	Na'uk nalak ewal vali ia, ma nafwaba lahir ne, “Ya'a wol uka'a tamata yai!”
40026073	Ba wol mnanat, na tamata ovi rna'a inyai rma ma rfalak verin Petrus ne, “Oa ini vali morang Yesus, tevek tka'a lahir na'a mu vai a.”
40026074	Petrus nalak matmatan watan ia ma ka'i nafwaba tenan a ma nfalak ne, “Ya'a wol uka'a tamata yai.” Na'ut inyai lahir, na manut nkukuwai.
40026075	Ba Petrus nangnanang nal-ewal vaivatul ovi Yesus nfalak lan roak verin Ia ne, “Manut wol nkukuwai obin, na oa veka malak nala fatelu roak ne, wol mka'a Ya'a.” Nata Petrus nti talik wan yai ma nvakar ma na'a samsekur.
40027001	Ti ma varverak sumatan, na Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra munuk ovu dawan Yahudi liak ra vali rasdovu ira ma ranovak ma ra'an vai isa mane rfedan Yesus.
40027002	Ba rkeak Yesus, beti rovun Ia ti verin Pilatus, tamata Roma i nfareta propinsi Yudea.
40027003	Ti ma Yudas i nfedi Yesus nsi'ik ne, rvolan roak ma rfedan Yesus, na ralan lalau urun na'a ni sala i notu a. Ba nal-ewal kubang perak vututelu yai verin Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu dawan Yahudi liak ra.
40027004	Ba nfalak verin ira ne, “Ya'a sala roak ya'a, tevek ufedi tamata i wol Ni sala ma rukun roak Ia ma nmata.” Na'uk Yahudi rira dawan avyai rfalak ne, “Ami wol amkamlabir afa yai. Inyai oa mu varvara.”
40027005	Ba Yudas nasba vatuk kubang avyai rti Rahan Dawan Falurut ralan a. Ia nban-talik wan yai ma ka'i ti nesa relan a ma naklo'i ma nmata.
40027006	Nata Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra rala kubang avyai ma rfalak ne, “Ita wol bisma tfadoku ewal kubang ovi na'a vatvatat i tamata ra ba'i rfadoku rira kubang ra, ma reluk rira persembahan verin Ubu. Ita tala roak kubang avyai ma al rotu ma tamata laran nvoat.”
40027007	Ba rasdovu ira ma ra'an vai isa ma rala kubang avyai al rfaha lanun i ba'i rala ma al rotu suran. Ba rfaha lanun yai, boma wean i tamata dakan ra rmata, na roving ira na'a inyai.
40027008	Wean inyai bi ma naran amar ini, na tamata ra rfanara wan yai ne, lanun i tamata laran nvoat na'a.
40027009	Ba afa yai nfakena lahir afa ovi lan a nabi Yeremia ntulis ne, “Ira rala roak kubang perak vututelu. Ira rfadoku roak fyawan wean inyai verin tamata ovi rna'a Israel.
40027010	Ira rala vali kubang avyai ma al rfaha lanun i ba'i rala ma al rotu suran, wean lahir i Duila'a nfalak roak verin ya'a.”
40027011	Na'ut i Yesus ndiri Gubernur Pilatus wahan ralan a, na Pilatus norat Ia ne, “Yahudi rira raja verin Oa?” Yesus nfalak ne, “Oa ka'i fwalak roak yai.”
40027012	Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu dawan Yahudi liak ra rmangadu Yesus, na'uk Ia wol nangrihi vaivatul isa vali.
40027013	Ba Pilatus norat ewal Yesus ne, “Wol mrenar ngrihi sian ovi rala al rmangadu Oa yai!”
40027014	Na'uk Yesus wol nala vaivatul isa vali, ba Pilatus ntalkaka lahir.
40027015	Lokat varat na'ut amar dawan Paskah, na gubernur ba'i nfatalik tamata isa. Yahudi ra rfili tamata yai tali bu'i ralan.
40027016	Na'ut inyai, na tamata isa nana'a bu'i ralan naran Yesus Barabas. Tamata ra munuk rka'a roak ia, tevek afa sian ovi notu ra.
40027017	Ba ti ma tamata rivun rasdovu ira, na Pilatus norat ira ne, “Inabira ma ufatalik iki verin mia? Yesus Barabas te Yesus i rfanara Ia ne, Kristus?”
40027018	Pilatus nka'a roak ne, Yahudi rira dawan ra ralarira sian Yesus, ba rovun Ia verin Pilatus.
40027019	Na'ut i Pilatus ndoku kadera i ba'i ndoku ma nfaleka inukun verin tamata ra, na awan a nsinir tamata isa ma nfalak verin ia ne, “Deka movu ma mukun tamata i wol ni sala yai, tevek Ia bi indean a umdedar lalean na'a ning mifi a.”
40027020	Na'uk Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu Yahudi rira dawan liak ra rtuar tamata rivun avyai, boma rera verin Pilatus ma nfatalik Barabas verin ira, ovu nsinir ma rfedan Yesus.
40027021	Nata Gubernur Pilatus norat ira ne, “Ba tali tamata irua ini, na inabira ma ufatalik iki verin mia?” Ira rfalak ne, “Barabas.”
40027022	Pilatus norat ewal ira ne, “Ba wean inyai, na ya'a musti otu afaka verin Yesus i rfanara Ia ne, Kristus?” Ira munuk rafwak ne, “Bwaku Ia na'a aa walwalur!”
40027023	Pilatus nfalak verin ira ne, “Afakinimi? Notu sala afaka?” Na'uk rafwak ma vairira dawan ila'a ne, “Bwaku Ia na'a aa walwalur!”
40027024	Pilatus nsi'ik roak ne, veka wol not-nala roak tamata rivun avyai, tevek mane rotu vangoa-vanga. Ba nala wear ma nraming liman a na'a waharira ralan ra ma nfalak ne, “Ya'a wol ning varvara na'a tamata ini ni matmatan a. Mia bira varvara ini.”
40027025	Tamata rivun avyai rafwak ne, “Ami ovu yanamami ra ki amvara tamata ini laran a.”
40027026	Nata Pilatus nfatalik Barabas verin ira. Na'uk ia nfalak verin ni suldadu ra ma rasveva Yesus veki, beti nala Ia verin ira ma rbaku Ia na'a aa walwalur.
40027027	Gubernur Pilatus ni suldadu ra rovun Yesus rti Pilatus ni rahan fareta dawan, beti rasdovu rira suldadu liak ra munuk ma rdir-lilit Yesus.
40027028	Nata ira raling Ni kadaravit ra, ma rala ravit blawat ungu isa ma ra'adoru na'a Ia.
40027029	Ira ranan aa anan ovi imarira ra na'a sabe'u ma rfadoku na'a Yesus ulun a. Ira rala vali takil isa ma ntaha na'a liman mela a, beti rsangatur na'a wahan ralan a ma rworuk-rwak Ia ma rfalak ne, “Yahudi rira Raja verin Oa, ba fara nam a blawat!”
40027030	Ira rafnit na'a Ia, ovu rala takil i ntaha yai ma rsikati ira al rvaval ulun a.
40027031	Ba ti ma rworuk-rwak munuk Ia, na raling ewal ravit blawat ungu i neluk a, beti rung a reluk ewal Ia ovu Ni kadaravit ra. Nata rovun Ia nti murin ma rbaku Ia na'a aa walwalur.
40027032	Na'ut i mane rbana rti kota Yerusalem murin a, na rtuan tamata isa ntali kota Kirene naran Simon. Suldadu ra rkiwal ia ma nvara Yesus Ni aa walwalur a.
40027033	Nata ti raran wan isa naran Golgota. Vaivatul yai ihin a, “Kalkulun Wan.”
40027034	Tamata avyai rala anggur i rsileti ovu afa i kfera, beti rala verin Yesus ma nenu. Na'uk ti ma Yesus nfatemang, na nafena ma nenu.
40027035	Rbaku Yesus na'a aa walwalur, beti rbataru ma rsiduk ni kadaravit ra.
40027036	Nata rdoku aa walwalur nelan a ma rwanar Ia.
40027037	Na'a aa walwalur ni tutul a, na rtulis vaivatul ra na'a kba etal isa ma nfalyawang ne wean inbinimi rukun Yesus. Vaivatul avyai ngoarira ra wean ini, “Yahudi rira Raja verin Yesus.”
40027038	Amar yai, na rbaku vali tamata ktufan irua na'a aa walwalur. Isa na'a Yesus Ni lihir mela a, na isa na'a Ni lihir balit a
40027039	Tamata ovi rahu inyai rarwa'ung ulurira ra ma rfalak sian Yesus.
40027040	Ira rfalak ne, “Ya'i yo! Oa fwalak ne, bisma ma'ar vatuk dida Rahan Dawan Falurut a ovu fwadiri ewal na'a amar itelu. Wean i Ubu Yanan urun Oa, na msuta tali aa walwalur yai, boma deka mwata.”
40027041	Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra, ovu vali rira dawan liak ra rdiri vali wan yai ma rworuk-rwak Ia. Ira rfalak ne,
40027042	“Ia not-nala ma tamata liak wol rmata, na'uk wol not-nala ma deka nmata. Wean i Israel rira Raja verin Ia, na nsuta tali aa walwalur yai, boma torang Ia.
40027043	Ia norang Ubu ovu nfalak ne, Ubu Yanan Ia. Eka tsi'ik, wean i Ubu veka nala Ia, na nva'at te wahal?”
40027044	Tamata ktufan irua i rbaku roak ira na'a aa walwalur ma rna'a Yesus Ni lihir mela ovu balit yai, rangrihi visal-vasil vali Ia wean inyai.
40027045	Na'ut inyai lera ndirlola, na deda fafyat nsoru munuk wan yai, ti naran jam tiga lersian.
40027046	Ba na'ut jam tiga lersian, na Yesus nafwak ne, “Eli, Eli lama sabaktani?” Yesus Ni vaivatul avyai ihin a wean ini, “O Ubu i uraning a, O Ubu i uraning a! Afakinimi muti talik Ya'a i?”
40027047	Tamata ovi rdiri inyai rarenar afa i Yesus nfalak a, ba rfalak ne, “Ia nera nabi Elia!”
40027048	Ba tamata isa ti nala spons etal isa ma nsovu na'a anggur i nakbia, ma nngatan teri spons yai na'a aa etal isa ni tutul a ma nlauk rata verin Yesus ma nbuk.
40027049	Na'uk tamata boku rfalak ne, “Tnaban veki! Eka tsi'ik, beta ne Elia nma ma nlobang Ia ma deka nmata.”
40027050	Nata Yesus nafwak ewal ma vain a dawan, na nan nakbosal lahir.
40027051	Na'ut inyai vali, na maloli dawan amafal i naklo'i Yahudi rira Rahan Dawan Falurut ralan a namadir lahir na'ut irua, tali ratan nsuta naran fun. Ruru dawan vali, ba vatu dawan ra rablihir munuk.
40027052	Van ovi rfadoku matmatan ra ratvadil, ba tamata rivun ovi rorang urun Ubu, na'uk rmata roak yai, Ubu nfava'at ewal ira.
40027053	Tamata matmatan avyai rva'at ewal ma rti talik warira ra na'a van ra. Ti ma Yesus nva'at ewal tali matmatan, na ira rti Yerusalem, kota i nmerat urun, ma tamata rivun rsi'ik ira.
40027054	Roma rira suldadu dawan isa ovu ni suldadu ovi rwanar Yesus, rsi'ik Yesus ti naran i nan a nakbosal a, ovu rfarnuang ruru i dawan a, ba rbobar urun i lahir. Ba rfalak ne, “Kena urun, tamata ini Ubu Yanan a!”
40027055	Na'a wan yai, na vata rivun rsi'ik afa avyai tali raroa watan. Vata avyai rorang Yesus tali Galilea, boma rlobang Ia.
40027056	Tali vata avyai, na boku nararira Maria Magdalena, Maria i yanan verin Yakobus ovu Yusuf, ovu vali Zebedeus awan a. Zebedeus irua awan a yanarira verin Yohanes ovu Yakobus.
40027057	Ya'i laflofan roak, na tamata ka'i isa naran Yusuf, ntali ahu Arimatea nma. Ia norang roak Yesus.
40027058	Ia ti ntuan Pilatus ma nera Yesus tenan a. Ba Pilatus nsinir ni tamata ra ma rala Yesus tenan a verin Yusuf.
40027059	Yusuf nala Yesus tenan a ma nkuma Ia ovu maloli ngangiar marmerat i naran lenan.
40027060	Nata Yusuf nti ma nfanuba Yesus tenan a na'a vatu i rtivan roak ia ma wean van. Van yai, Yusuf nia ovu ngorva'an obin. Ia nlawar vatu dawan isa ma al nulang teri van ngoran a, beti nti talik wan yai.
40027061	Maria Magdalena ovu Maria isa vali rna'a inyai. Ira rdoku van yai ngoran a.
40027062	Ni ilyan a, na'a amar i Yahudi ra ryari ira, na Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu tamata Farisi ra, irmunuk rti ma rtuan Pilatus.
40027063	Ira rfalak verin Pilatus ne, “Baba, ami amangnanang na'ut i tamata siklabir eri nva'at obin, na nfalak roak ne, ‘Ti ma amar itelu nelak, na veka uva'at ewal.’
40027064	Ba wean inyai bi fwareta mu suldadu ra ma ti rwanar van i rfanuba Ia na'a, ti naran amar itelu. Tevek wean i wahal, na Ni tamata ra veka rti ma rbori tenan a ma rfalak verin tamata rivun ne, ‘Ia nva'at ewal roak tali matmatan!’ Ba wean i afa yai nvotuk, na rira siklabir ra veka ntafal ma dawan ila'a.”
40027065	Pilatus nfalak verin dawan Yahudi avyai ne, “Myovun suldadu ra miti ma myanar kakiwal van yai.”
40027066	Ba rati van yai ma rfadoku faneak na'a vatu i nteri van ngoran a, boma wean i tamata ra rlabir van yai, na rka'a. Rotu munuk wean inyai, beti rfalak ma suldadu avyai rwanar ma lolin van yai.
40028001	Amar i Yahudi ra ryari ira yai nelak roak, na Maria Magdalena ovu Maria liak isa vali rti ma rsi'ik van matmatan i rfanuba Yesus tenan a. Na'ut inyai, na lera sarseri mane ndata roak na'a amar kareda.
40028002	Ruru dawan urun na'a inyai, tevek Duila'a Ni sansinir isa ntali lanit ratan nsuta ma nlawar vatu i nteri van ngoran yai, ma ndoku vatu yai ratan a.
40028003	Felan a nyadat ma wean fitik, ovu ni ravit blawat a nangiar ma wean avat minan.
40028004	Suldadu ovi rwanar van yai rbobar ma raruru lalean ira, ba rleka rsuta fun ma wean tamata ovi rmata roak.
40028005	Na'uk sansinir yai nfalak verin vata avyai ne, “Deka byobar, tevek uka'a roak ne, mya ma mdyava Yesus i rbaku roak Ia na'a aa walwalur a.
40028006	Ia wol nleal roak ini. Ia nva'at ewal roak, wean i nfalak lan roak verin mia. Eka mya ma msyi'ik wan i rfanuba Ia na'a.
40028007	Ba myewal lahir mia ma ti fyamalik verin Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, Yesus nva'at ewal roak tali matmatan, ma veka ula Ia nti propinsi Galilea. Mia veka mtyuan Ia na'a ineri. Afa ovi ufamalik roak verin mia ini, kena urun!”
40028008	Vata irua yai rafla talik van matmatan yai. Ira rbobar urun, na'uk ralarira lolin urun i vali, ba rfarlan mane ti rfamalik afa ini verin Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia.
40028009	Brian munuk, na Yesus ntuan ira ma nfalak ne, “Oo Titi averi!” Ba vata irua yai rfaseri Ia, ma rsangatur ovu rangabuk ean a ma rfadawang Ia.
40028010	Ba Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Deka byobar! Miti ma fyalak verin Ning tamata ra ma rti Galilea, tevek na'a ineri, na veka rsi'ik Ya'a.”
40028011	Vata irua yai rbana obin, na suldadu ifira tali ovi rwanar van yai rti kota ralan ma rfamalik afa ovi rarea yai verin Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra.
40028012	Ti ma suldadu ovi rwanar van yai rfalak munuk afa avyai verin mela falurut ra ovu dawan Yahudi ra, na ira ra'an vai isa ma rala kubang dawan verin suldadu avyai.
40028013	Yahudi rira mela falurut ra rfareta ira ne, “Mia musti fyalak ne, ‘Ovan yai, na amtub-lufa munuk roak, beti Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rma ma rbori tenan a.’
40028014	Wean i Gubernur Pilatus nrenar afa ini, na ami ki amangrihi ma amlotar mia, boma deka angangal akataka verin mia.”
40028015	Ba ira rala kubang avyai ma rewal roak ira, ma ti rfamalik wean i rsurak roak verin ira yai. Ivar ini ti nsoru roak Yahudi ra ma naran amar ini.
40028016	Yesus Ni tamata vutu rahin isa yai rti Galilea, ma rna'a vuar i Yesus nfalak roak verin ira.
40028017	Ti ma rsi'ik Ia, na rsangatur lahir ma rfadawang Ia, na'uk boku ralarira ra raruan obin.
40028018	Yesus nfaseri ira ma nfalak ne, “Ubu nala munuk roak ngrebat verin Ya'a na'a lanit ratan ovu lanit ivavan a.
40028019	Ba miti ma fyamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin verin bangsa ra munuk na'a lanit ivavan a, boma rorang Ya'a. Byaptis ira na'a Yamang a naran a, Yanan a, ovu Ni Roh a.
40028020	Myair ira ma rot-orang afa ovi ufareta munuk roak verin mia yai. Ya'a veka ufatuang mia, nata ti naran i lanit ivavan namwear a.”
41001001	Ivar Lolin i nfamalik Ubu Yanan a Yesus Kristus beti nvotuk.
41001002	Lalan ana, nabi Yesaya ntulis Ivar Lolin yai ne, “Ubu nfalak ne, ‘Ini Ya'a Ning tamata sansinir; Ya'a usinir lan ia ma nasusan linga'an verin oa.’
41001003	Tamata isa nafwak na'a wan lean vu dawan ne, ‘Misusan linga'an verin Duila'a, fyamalola linga'an ra!’ ”
41001004	Tamata i Ubu nsinir ia yai naran Yohanes. Ia nleal wan lean vu dawan isa ma nbaptis tamata ra. Ni ravit a blawat i noru a, rotu tali afwatan i naran unta, vulun ra. Ni ngesa rotu vali tali afwatan ulin. Ni fana'an a kabina ovu wenan vahan i na'a nangan. Ia nfamalik Ubu Ni vaivatul ra verin tamata ra, ma rahil ma rtalik tali rira salasilan ra, boma Ubu na'i vatuk rira salasilan ra, beti rala tenarira ra ma nbaptis ira. Tamata rivun ila'a rtali propinsi Yudea ovu kota Yerusalem rti ma rarenar afa ovi Yohanes nfalak ra. Ira rahil ma rfavotuk rira salasilan ra verin Ubu, ba Yohanes nbaptis ira na'a oar Yordan.
41001007	Ia nfamalik lalawatan verin tamata ra ne, “Wol mnanat, na tamata isa veka nma, ovu Ni ngrebat a nlia ya'a. Ya'a wol verang a ratan Ia, ba wol inovan ma usangatur ma aling ni tatea ni tatur a.
41001008	Ya'a ubaptis mia ovu wear, na'uk Ia veka nbaptis mia ovu Ni Roh a.”
41001009	Na'ut i Yohanes nbaptis tamata ra, na Yesus ntali ahu Nazaret i nana'a propinsi Galilea nma ma Yohanes nbaptis Ia na'a oar Yordan.
41001010	Na'ut i Yesus ndata tali wear, na brian munuk nsi'ik, na wean i lanit natvadil, ma Ubu Ni Roh nsuta wean modarlaka ma ndoku tenan a.
41001011	Vai isa ntali lanit ratan nfalak ne, “Oa ini Yanak i ulobang urun a. Oa motu ma ralang a lolin urun.”
41001012	Ubu Ni Roh novun lahir Yesus ma nti wan lean vu dawan isa.
41001013	Ba Ia nana'a wan lean vu dawan yai, na nitdawan nlabir teman Ia ma naran amar vutfa'at. Yesus nana'a inyai ovu afwatan ra, na Ubu Ni sansinir ra tali lanit ratan rfatuang Ia ma rlobang Ia.
41001014	Fareta ra ra'abu'i roak Yohanes. Nata Yesus nti propinsi Galilea ma nfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin a.
41001015	Ba Ia nfalak ne, “Amar nma ma naran roak ma Ubu nfareta wean lahir Raja. Myahil ma mtyalik tali bira salasilan ra ma myorang a'uk Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin!”
41001016	Amar isa, na Yesus nbana na'a danau Galilea nelan a, na nrea tamata irua, iya'an iwarin ira. Isa naran Simon ovu isa vali naran Andreas. Ira sinat roal ira, ba rfasuka rira jaring na'a inyai ma al rdava ian.
41001017	Ba Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Mya ma myorang Ya'a! Mia wol fyasuka jaring roak ma nala ian, tevek ala karya verin mia ma myair tamata ra ma rorang Ya'a.”
41001018	Ba rfadoku lahir rira jaring ra na'a inyai ma rorang Ia.
41001019	Nata nban-ewal ma nsi'ik Yakobus irua warin a naran Yohanes, yamarira naran Zebedeus. Ira rna'a rira kumal ralan ma rlavan rira jaring ra.
41001020	Yesus nera lahir ira ma rorang Ia, ba rsuta talik yamarira ovu tamata ovi ra'an kadi tali ira na'a rira kumal yai, ma rorang Ia.
41001021	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rti raran ahu isa naran Kapernaum. Na'ut amar i Yahudi ryari ira, na Yesus nti lahir Yahudi rira rahan falurut ralan a, ma nsiair na'a inyai.
41001022	Tamata ovi rarenar afa ovi nair ra rtalkaka lahir, tevek nsiair ovu Ubu Ni ngrebat a, wol wean Yahudi ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra.
41001023	Brian munuk, na brana isa i nait sian nleal ia nti Yahudi rira rahan falurut ralan a, ma nait sian notu ma brana yai nafwak ne,
41001024	“Hoi, Yesus tamata Nazaret, deka mlabir ami! Oa mwa ini mane fwedan ami? Ya'a uka'a ne iki Oa. Oa sansinir i ralam nmerat urun tali Ubu.”
41001025	Yesus nfalak verin nait sian yai ne, “Deka vaim! Muti talik brana ini!”
41001026	Nait sian yai notu ma brana yai nafwak ma vain a dawan, ovu notu ma tenan raruru lalean, nata nti talik ia.
41001027	Tamata ra munuk rtalkaka, ba rsiorat ira ne, “Ya'i yo, ini afaka? Ia Ni ngrebat ma nair afa ngorva'an! Ia bisma nfareta nait sian ra vali ma rot-orang afa ovi nfalak ra.”
41001028	Tamata ra rfamalik Yesus verin tamata rivun na'a wan Galilea munuk.
41001029	Yesus irtelu Yakobus ovu Yohanes rtali Yahudi rira rahan falurut ralan rti murin, beti rti Simon ovu Andreas rira rahan a.
41001030	Tamata ovi rna'a rahan yai rfalak verin Yesus ne, “Simon avan a tenan ngnea, ba ntuba watan.”
41001031	Yesus nti wan i vata yai nana'a ma ntaha liman a, ma nfabatar ia, na lolin lahir ia. Ba vata yai nasusan afamtahan verin ira ma ra'an.
41001032	Lera nakduvul ma laflofan roak, beti tamata ra rovun tamata ovi raruru ira, ovu ovi nait sian ra rleal ira ti verin Yesus.
41001033	Tamata ra munuk na'a ahu yai rasdovu ira na'a rahan ngoran.
41001034	Yesus notu ma lolin tamata rivun tali rira suhut afaka watan, ovu naling vatuk nait sian ra tali tamata ra. Ia wol ntorung ma nait sian ra rangrihi, tevek rka'a munuk roak ne, Ubu Yanan Ia.
41001035	Nfada'ing amar, na Yesus nbatar ma nti talik rahan yai. Ia nti wan lean vu isa, ma naflurut na'a inyai.
41001036	Nata Simon ovu ni kida ra ti rdava Ia.
41001037	Ba rdav-nala Ia, na rfalak ne, “Tamata rivun rdava Oa!”
41001038	Yesus nfalak ne, “Eka tati ahu liak ra vali ma ufamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin a verin tamata ovi rna'a ineri, tevek Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin yai bi uma ini.”
41001039	Ba nban-soru wan Galilea munuk ma nfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin na'a Yahudi rira rahan falurut ra, ovu naling vatuk nait sian ra tali tamata ra.
41001040	Tamata isa ni suhut ngabaa nma ma ntuan Yesus, ma nsangatur na'a wahan ralan al nera verin Ia ne, “Baba, wean i mtorung, na fara motu ma lolin ewal ya'a.”
41001041	Yesus nfaturu Ni silobang verin tamata yai, ba nlauk liman a ma nkena ia, ma nfalak ne, “Ya'a ulobang oa, ba lolin kikyai oa!”
41001042	Brian munuk, na tamata yai lolin ia, tevek ni suhut nlia roak.
41001043	Ba Yesus nsinir lahir ia ma nfalak ne, “Ufangnanang oa ne, deka fwamalik afa ini verin tamata iki watan. Na'uk muti lahir ma fwaturu tenam a verin Yahudi rira mela falurut a ma nsi'ik oa. Mala mu korban verin Ubu, wean i rfalak roak na'a Musa ni inukun ra, boma tamata ra rka'a ne, lolin roak oa.”
41001045	Na'uk tamata yai ti nfaivar soru ne, lolin roak ia. Ba Yesus wol nti ahu ralan, boma tamata ra deka rarea Ia. Ia nti ahu murin watan ma nleal wan i wol tamata rna'a, na'uk tamata ra rtali wan rivun rma lalawatan ma rtuan Ia na'a inyai.
41002001	Nata amar ifira nelak roak, na Yesus nati ewal ahu Kapernaum, ma tamata ra rarenar ivar ne, newal roak Ia.
41002002	Ba tamata rivun rasdovu ira na'a rahan i Yesus nana'a, ma rahan ralan ovu falfolat ngoran nngora lahir na'a tamata ra, ma Yesus nfamalik Ubu Ni vaivatul ra verin ira.
41002003	Tamata ifa'at rsikat brana laklukut isa ma rati inyai.
41002004	Na'uk wol rti nala rahan ralan ma rtuan Yesus, tevek tamata rivun da'in. Ba rarata rahan ratan a, ma rotu ma nablahi ma rtolar tamata laklukut yai ovu ni dari i ntuba na'a.
41002005	Yesus nsi'ik tamata avyai, na nka'a lahir ne, rira inorang a dawan, ba nfalak verin tamata laklukut yai ne, “Baba, a'i vatuk roak mu salasilan ra.”
41002006	Nata tamata boku tali Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra rdoku inyai ma ranovak na'a ralarira ne,
41002007	“Afakinimi tamata ini nangrihi wean ini? Ia nfalak sian Ubu! Wol tamata isa bisma na'i vatuk tamata rira salasilan ra. Ubu sa'i na'i vatuk.”
41002008	Yesus nka'a lahir afa i ranovak na'a ralarira ra, ba nfalak verin ira, “Afakinimi minovak wean inyai na'a ralabira ra?
41002009	Inabira ma ufalak verin tamata laklukut yai ne, ‘A'i vatuk roak mu salasilan ra,’ te ufalak ne, ‘Mdiri ma mlulung mu dari ma bwana.’ Afaka maraan ma ufalak na'a afa irua ini?
41002010	Boma mkya'a ne, na'a lanit ivavan ini, na Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a, Ning ngrebat ma a'i vatuk tamata rira salasilan ra.” Ba Yesus nfalak verin tamata laklukut yai ne,
41002011	“Ufalak verin oa ma mdiri, ovu mlulung mu dari a ma mewal oa muti mu rahan kikyai!”
41002012	Tamata laklukut yai ndiri ma nlulung ni dari a, ma nbana na'a tamata rivun avyai wahar ralan ra ma nati murin, ba tamata rivun rtalkaka ma rfadawang Ubu ma rfalak ne, “Afa i wean ini ita wol trea obin.”
41002013	Nata Yesus newal Ia nti danau Galilea nelan a, na tamata rivun rma ma rdir-lilit Ia, ba nair ira.
41002014	Ti ma Yesus nbana, na nrea tamata isa ndoku rahan i ba'i rera babahir kulu na'a. Ia naran Lewi, yaman a naran Alfeus. Yesus nfalak verin ia ne, “Morang Ya'a.” Ba Lewi ndir-talik ni karya a ma norang Yesus.
41002015	Na'ut inyai, na Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rafna'an na'a Lewi ni rahan. Tamata rivun ovi rera babahir kulu tali tamata ra, ovu tamata ovi tamata liak ra rfalak ira ne, tamata salasilan ra, rafna'an vali ovu Yesus, tevek tamata rivun rban-orang Ia.
41002016	Yahudi rira dawan boku ovi rair Ubu Ni inukun ra rtali Yahudi rira sidovung isa naran Farisi. Ira rorat Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, “Afakinimi Yesus nafna'an ovu tamata sian avyai?” Ira rfalak wean inyai, tevek rarea Yesus nafna'an ovu tamata ovi rera babahir kulu ra, ovu tamata ovi rotu salasilan.
41002017	Yesus nrenar rira afa ovi rfalak ra, ba nfalak ne, “Tamata ovi wol rira suhut ra wol rti dokter, na'uk ovi rira suhut ra a'uk sa'i rti dokter. Ya'a wol uma ma era tamata ovi rira vava'at ra rmalola, na'uk uma ma era tamata salasilan ra, ma rorang Ya'a.”
41002018	Na'ut inyai, na tamata ovi rorang Yohanes i nbaptis tamata ra, ntafal vali tamata ovi rtali sidovung Farisi, rtolat ma raflurut verin Ubu. Ba tamata boku rma ma rorat Yesus ne, “Afakinimi Yohanes ni tamata ra ovu ovi rorang tamata Farisi ra rtolat, na'uk Mu tamata ra wol rtolat i?”
41002019	Yesus nala vaivatul kamkuma ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Na'a snobsifa isa, na wean i brana i mane nsifa irmunuk ni kida ra obin, na musti rtolat? Wahal, ira veka rafna'an ovu rotu rira snobsifa.
41002020	Brana i mane nsifa yai ni amar a veka nma ma rala ia, ma wol nana'a roak ini. Na'ut inyai, beti rtolat.”
41002021	Yesus nfamalik vaivatul kamkuma isa ewal wean ini: “Wol tamata isa nlavan ni kadaravit mnanat ovu maloli ngorva'an, tevek maloli ngorva'an yai wol naslura obin, ba veka notu watan ma kadaravit yai ntafal ma namsat.
41002022	Wean vali inyai, ma wol tamata isa vali nli'i anggur ngorva'an na'a sadawan mnanat i rotu tali karba ulin a. Wean i tamata isa notu wean inyai, na sadawan veka naksat ma anggur yai nvoat, ovu vali sadawan sian lahir. Ba tli'i anggur ngorva'an na'a sadawan ovi ngorva'an ra a'uk.”
41002023	Amar isa na'ut i Yahudi ra ryari ira, na Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rban-etal va'i gandum ra, na Yesus Ni tamata ra rfufu gandum ni funu boku.
41002024	Tamata Farisi ra rfalak verin Yesus ne, “Msyi'ik kikyai! Afakinimi ira rangal dida agama ni inukun ra, ma rotu afa i wol bisma totu na'a amar i tyari ita?”
41002025	Yesus nfalak ne, “Mia wol byas obin afa ovi Raja Daud notu ra na'ut Abyatar neluk Yahudi rira Mela Falurut Ila'a? Daud ovu ni tamata ra rablafar, ba Ia nti befak dawan i ba'i raraning Ubu na'a. Ia nti ralan ma nala roti i rfadok-aling roak verin Ubu ma na'an. Nata ntanang vali roti avyai verin ni tamata ovi rorang ia, velik ne na'a dida agama ni inukun ra, na mela falurut ra a'uk sa'i bisma ra'an roti avyai.”
41002027	Nata Yesus ntafal ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Ubu nala amar isa ma tamata ra ryari ira. Ia wol nfadoku tamata verin amar i ryari ira.
41002028	Ya'a Tamata Yanan Ya'a, ba Ning fareta ti naran vali amar i tyari ita.”
41003001	Yesus newal Ia nti Yahudi rira rahan falurut ralan a, na brana isa na'a inyai liman lihir nmata.
41003002	Tamata Farisi ovi rna'a inyai rsi'ik nanuang Ia, betane notu ma lolin brana yai na'a amar i Yahudi ra ryari ira, boma rmangadu Ia.
41003003	Ia nfalak verin brana i liman nmata yai ne, “Mwa ma mdiri tamata ovi rna'a ini waharira ralan ra!”
41003004	Nata, Yesus norat tamata avyai ne, “Dida agama ni inukun ra rfalak ma bis totu afaka na'ut amar i tyari ita? Totu afa ovi lolin ra, te afa ovi sian ra? Tlobang tamata ra ma rva'at, te tfedan ira?” Na'uk ira wol vair lahir.
41003005	Yesus ralan a lalau, tevek ralarira ra rangrebat dalang, ba nsi'ik lilit ira ovu wahan nangrova. Ia nfalak verin brana yai ne, “Mlauk limam a mwa.” Ia nlauk liman a ma Yesus notu ma lolin lahir ia.
41003006	Tamata Farisi ra rdir-talik wan yai ma rti murin. Ba Farisi ra ovu tamata ovi rorang Herodes rasdovu lahir ira ma al ranovak ma ra'an vai isa mane rfedan Yesus.
41003007	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rewal ira rti danau Galilea. Tamata rivun ila'a rtali propinsi Galilea rorang ira, ovu tamata ovi rma vali rtali propinsi Yudea, rtali kota Yerusalem, propinsi Idumea, wan ovi rna'a oar Yordan ni lihir a, ovu vali rtali wan ovi sarseri ovu kota Tirus ovu kota Sidon. Tamata rivun ila'a rarenar ne, Yesus notu mujizat rivun, ba rma ma rtuan Yesus.
41003009	Ia nfalak verin Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ma ti rala kumal isa verin Ia, boma wean i tamata rivun avyai rdir-sidekin ira, na wol rdekin kena Ia.
41003010	Ia notu ma lolin roak tamata rivun ovi rira suhut ra, ba tamata liak ovi rira suhut obin rdir-sidekin ira ma rkiwal ma rkena Ia.
41003011	Tamata liak boku vali nait sian ra rleal ira, ma na'ut i rsi'ik Yesus, na rsangatur lahir verin Ia ma rafwak ne, “Ubu Yanan Oa!”
41003012	Na'uk Yesus nfalak teri lahir ma deka rfalak ne, iki Ia.
41003013	Yesus nva'al vuar isa ma nera tamata ovi ralan nfalak a ma rorang Ia. Ba tamata avyai rma ma rtuan Ia.
41003014	Ia nfili tamata vutu rahin irua ma reluk Ni rasul ma rorang Ia, boma nsinir ma rti rfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin,
41003015	ovu nala Ni ngrebat verin ira ma raling vatuk nait sian ra tali tamata ra.
41003016	Tamata ovi Yesus nfili ra, nararira Simon i Yesus nfanara ia ne Petrus,
41003017	Yakobus irua warin a Yohanes, yamarira naran Zebedeus (Yesus nfanara ira ne Boanerges, ihin a vairira wean dodung).
41003018	Andreas, Filipus, Bartolomeus, Matius, Tomas, Yakobus i yaman naran Alfeus, Tadeus, Simon i ntali sidovung isa naran Zelot,
41003019	ovu Yudas Iskariot i nfedi Yesus.
41003020	Nata Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rewal ira rti rahan i nleal a, na tamata rivun rasdovu ewal ira, ba Yesus ovu Ni tamata ra wol bisma rafna'an.
41003021	Ni tiniman rarenar afa yai, ba rti lahir ma rala Ia. Ira rfalak ne, “Yesus nfoar-nlakat roak!”
41003022	Yahudi rira dawan boku ovi rair Ubu Ni inukun ra rtali Yerusalem rma ma rfalak ne, “Beelzebul i nitdawan ia nleal Yesus! Nait sian rira dawan ini nala ngrebat verin Ia ma naling vatuk nait sian ra.”
41003023	Ba Yesus nera tamata rivun avyai ma nala vaivatul kamkuma al nfalak verin ira ne, “Nitdawan wol naling nala ni nait sian ra tali tamata.
41003024	Wean i rsiduk nuhu dawan isa na'ut ifira ma sidovung ra rotu rihi, na nuhu dawan yai veka nama'ar.
41003025	Wean i tamata ra rsingarahi na'a rahan teta isa, na rira rahan teta veka nama'ar vali.
41003026	Ba wean vali i nitdawan nsingarahi-sikual ovu ni nait sian ra, na ni fareta veka nama'ar ma wol nfaret-nala roak ira.
41003027	Wean vali inyai, wol tamata nti nala tamata ngrebat isa ni rahan ma nbori ni metan ra, na'uk musti nkeak ia veki, beti nbor-nala ni metan ra.
41003028	Afa i ufalak verin mia ini, kena urun! Ubu bisma na'i vatuk tamata rira salasilan ra, velik ne rfalak sian Ia.
41003029	Na'uk tamata ovi rfalak sian Ubu Ni Roh, na Ubu veka wol na'i vatuk roak rira salasilan ra. Ba rira salasilan yai nana'a, nata ti wol ni wahan.”
41003030	Yesus nfalak wean inyai, tevek tamata boku rfalak ne, nait sian nleal Ia.
41003031	Nata Yesus renan ovu warin ra rma, na'uk rdiri rahan murin watan, ba rsinir tamata ra ma ti rera Ia.
41003032	Tamata rivun rdok-lilit Yesus ma rfalak verin Ia ne, “Baba, ti ma msi'ik renam ovu warim ra rna'a murin eri. Ira inar ma rangrihi nulu Oa.”
41003033	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Ya'a renang iki te waring aba?”
41003034	Yesus nsi'ik tamata ovi rdok-lilit Ia ma nfalak ne, “Mia ini renang ovu waring ra!
41003035	Tamata iki watan not-orang afa ovi Ubu ralan nfalak a, na Ya'a urang ia, waring ia, ovu renang ia.”
41004001	Amar isa, na Yesus nsiair ewal vali na'a danau Galilea nelan a, na tamata rivun ila'a rdir-lilit Ia. Ba Yesus nti ma nrata ndoku kumal isa i nlau na'a danau, ma nsiair na'a inyai.
41004002	Yesus nala vaivatul kamkuma ra al nair afa rivun verin ira. Ba nair ira ma nfalak ne,
41004003	“Eka mryenar! Amar isa, na tamata va'i isa nti navuri nabat ra.
41004004	Na'ut i navuri nabat ra obin, na boku rleka na'a linga'an ralan, ba manut nangan ra rma ma ra'an munuk watan.
41004005	Nabat boku vali rleka na'a vatralan i lanun kadkedan watan. Wol mnanat, na nabat ra rarubu lahir, tevek lanun a masnifit watan.
41004006	Na'uk ti ma lera ndirlola, na nabat ovi rarubu roak yai roarira ra rakla munuk ma rangaran, tevek wol rabwa'ar ma lolin obin.
41004007	Nabat boku vali rleka na'a kadkadir ralan. Kadkadir avyai rmel-yatak irubun ra, ba wol vuarira.
41004008	Tali nabat avyai, na boku vali rleka na'a lanun tinemun, ba rarubu rmela ma lolin, ovu vuarira; funu boku rira vatul ra vatvutun taltelun, boku vatvutun nanean, boku vali ratratut sasan.”
41004009	Nata Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Iki arun, na eka nrenar ma lolin!”
41004010	Ti ma Yesus ovu Ni tamata vutu rahin irua, ntafal vali tamata boku ovi rorang Ia, rti talik roak tamata rivun avyai, na rorat Yesus ne, “Vaivatul kamkuma inlangin a, ihin wean inba?”
41004011	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Ubu notu ma fyan-aran afa ovi Ia wol nfavotuk obin verin tamata ra na'a i wean inba ma nfareta tamata ra wean lahir Raja. Na'uk verin tamata liak ra, na air ira ovu vaivatul kamkuma ra,
41004012	boma: velik ne rsi'ik afa ovi otu ra, na'uk wol rfan-aran afa avyai. Rarenar Ning vaivatul ra, na'uk wol rfan-aran vali, boma deka rahil ma rtalik tali rira salasilan ra, ma Ubu wol na'i vatuk rira salasilan ra.”
41004013	Ba Yesus nfalak verin tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, “Mia wol mkya'a vaivatul kamkuma ini, ba wean inba ma mkya'a munuk vaivatul kamkuma ovi veka ufamalik verin mia?
41004014	Tamata va'i yai navuri nabat ra, wean ia nfamalik Ubu Ni vaivatul ra.
41004015	Tamata ovi rarenar Ubu Ni vaivatul ra, wean nabat ovi rleka na'a linga'an ralan. Na'ut i rarenar, na nitdawan nma lahir ma nal-ewal Ubu Ni vaivatul avyai ma wol rna'a ralarira ra.
41004016	Tamata liak boku wean nabat ovi rleka na'a vatralan. Tamata avyai rarenar Ubu Ni vaivatul ra ma rtorung lahir ovu ralarira lolin.
41004017	Na'uk ira wean irubun ovi wol rabwa'ar, ba wol rtahang ma mnanat. Ba ti ma rtuan susa te tamata ra rwi-rwa ira, tevek rorang Ya'a, na rafla talik lahir rira inorang a.
41004018	Tamata liak boku vali wean nabat ovi rleka na'a kadkadir ralan. Ira rarenar Ubu Ni vaivatul ra,
41004019	na'uk ralarira ra raruan na'a afa rivun, ma inar ma rira metan rivun, ovu inar ma rira afa liak ra vali. Ba Ubu Ni vaivatul ra wol wan roak na'a ralarira ra, ma rira vava'at ra wol vuarira.
41004020	Na'uk tamata liak boku wean nabat ovi rleka na'a lanun tinemun. Ira rarenar Ubu Ni vaivatul ra ovu rtorung ma rala na'a ralarira ra, ba vuarira rivun, ma boku vatvutun taltelun, boku vatvutun nanean, ovu vali ratratut sasan.”
41004021	Ba Yesus nfalak verin tamata avyai ne, “Tamata ra wol rtutun damar ma rulang teri ovu ngusi, te rfadoku na'a ko'i vavan a. Na'uk ira veka rfadoku damar na'a damar wan, te wahal?
41004022	Afa fanfonak ra veka lyawan, ovu afa ovi tamata ra wol rka'a veka rvotuk.
41004023	Ba iki arun, na eka nrenar ma lolin!”
41004024	Nata Yesus ntafal ma nfalak ewal ne, “Fyikir ma lolin na'a afa i mryenar! Tamata i norang afa ovi air verin ia, na Ubu veka ntafal ma nfan-aran afa ovi ufalak ra.
41004025	Tamata iki watan inan ma nfan-aran Ubu Ni vaivatul ra, na Ubu veka ntafal ni kaka'a. Tamata iki watan wol inan ma nfan-aran Ubu Ni vaivatul ra, velik ne nka'a kadkedan roak, na Ubu veka nala munuk kaka'a yai tali ia.”
41004026	Yesus nfalak ewal ne, “Ubu nfareta tamata ra wean lahir Raja veka wean ini. Tamata isa nti ni va'i ma nava nabat ra.
41004027	Tamata yai ovan-amar tuba-batar watan ia. Nabat avyai rarubu ovu rmela ma dawan ira, na'uk ia wol nka'a ne, afakinimi wean inyai.
41004028	Lanun sa'i nfaihing afamtahan ra ma vuarira. Ba kan ra ula ira, nata funu ra, beti vuan ra.
41004029	Wean i vuarira rwavar roak, na tamata va'i yai nti ma nafdiar, tevek naran roak amar fadiar a.”
41004030	Yesus norat vali ira ne, “Ubu nfareta tamata ra wean lahir Raja, na felan a veka wean inba? Ufamalik vaivatul kamkuma aka al ufalyawang Ni Fareta a?
41004031	Na'ut i Ubu nfareta tamata ra wean lahir Raja, na veka wean ini: tamata isa nala sesawi ni vatul a ma nava na'a ni va'i a. Sesawi ni vatul yai ko'u lia munuk tali afa ovi rira vatul ra munuk na'a lanit ivavan a.
41004032	Na'uk ti ma narubu, na dawan lia munuk afa liak ovi rna'a va'i a. Sanan ra dawan, ba manut nangan ra ti rotu rira renga na'a.”
41004033	Yesus nair tamata ra ovu vaivatul kamkuma rivun ovi wean vaivatul kamkuma avyai, ma inovan ovu rira kaka'a.
41004034	Ia nair ira ovu vaivatul kamkuma ra watan, na'uk ti ma nana'a aling Ia ovu Ni tamata vutu rahin irua ovi rorang Ia, na nfalyawang munuk afa avyai verin ira.
41004035	Nata lera nakduvul ma laflofan roak, na Yesus nfalak verin Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, “Mya ma tati danau Galilea ni lihir a.”
41004036	Yesus ndoku kumal ralan obin, na Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia raroal ma rarata kumal yai, beti rti talik tamata rivun avyai. Kumal liak boku rorang vali ira.
41004037	Nata nait fufakmetan nkena ira, ba saksakan ra mane rulang ira, ovu wear ndata lahir rira kumal ralan a, ba sarseri ma rakduvul.
41004038	Yesus naluni bantal isa na'a kumal ni muri a, ma ntub-lufa. Ni tamata ra rkadu Ia ma rfalak ne, “Tuan Guru, Oa wol fwaduli lahir! Ita mane takduvul roak ini!”
41004039	Yesus nbatar ma nfareta nait a, ma nfalak verin saksakan ra ne, “Ngarlina kikyai!” Nait ovu saksakan rtalik lahir ma danau yai ngarlina ma latlatan.
41004040	Ba Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Mia byobar aka? Afakinimi wol myorang Ya'a?”
41004041	Ira rbobar urun i lahir ma rsifalak afa verin ira ne, “Ini tamata iki mnga'un, ma nfaret-nala nait ovu saksakan ra ma rorang Ia?”
41005001	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia raran roak danau ni lihir a, na'a wan i tamata Gerasa rleal.
41005002	Yesus nsuta tali kumal ralan a, na brana isa nait sian nleal ia, ntali van ovi rfadoku tamata matmatan na'a nma ma ntuan Yesus.
41005003	Brana yai nana'a watan van matmatan avyai, ovu tamata ra wol rdadul nala roak ia, velik ne rdadul ia ovu kakeak tma'an.
41005004	Tamata ra rdadul ma rivun roak liman a ean a ovu kakeak tma'an, na'uk not-visal watan kakeak ra. Wol tamata isa ntaha teri nala ia, tevek nangrebat da'in.
41005005	Ovan-amar ia nbana tia ma watan na'a van avyai, ovu nafwak lalawatan na'a vuar ra, ovu vali nala vatu ovi ramneran ra ma al nfamngala tenan a.
41005006	Na'ut i nsi'ik Yesus tali raroa nma, na nafla ti ntuan Ia ma nsangatur ma nraning Ia.
41005007	Yesus nfalak verin nait sian i nleal brana yai ne, “Oa nait sian oa, ba muti talik brana ini!” Nait sian yai notu ma brana yai nafwak ne, “Yesus mwa ini ma motu afaka verin ya'a? Oa ini Ubu i Ni dawan nlia munuk afakataka Yanan Oa. Ala Ubu naran a ma era verin Oa ne, deka motu sian ya'a!”
41005009	Ba Yesus norat ia ne, “Oa naram iki?” Ia nfalak ne, “Ya'a narang Legion, tevek nait sian rivun ami.”
41005010	Ba nera lalawatan verin Yesus ma deka nsinir ira ma rti talik wan yai.
41005011	Vavu dur dawan isa rfaseri wan yai ma rafnuak al rdava rira fana'an na'a vuar ni dadudur a.
41005012	Nata nait sian avyai rera lablobang verin Yesus ne, “Fara msinir ami ma ti amna'a vavu averi.”
41005013	Yesus ntorung, ba nait sian ra rti talik brana yai ma ti rna'a vavu dur yai. Vavu avyai, snain nlabas rivun irua, rafla ma rti rtobur tali bili'in nelan ma rsuta danau ralan ma rakduvul ma rmata munuk.
41005014	Tamata ovi rfawatak vavu avyai rafla ma ti rfamalik na'a kota isa ovu ahu ovi rfaseri inyai ne, Yesus nsinir nait sian ra ma ti rna'a vavu dur isa. Ba tamata ra ti ma ramunin afa i Yesus beti notu a.
41005015	Ba rma ma rtuan Yesus, na rarea brana i lan a, nait sian ra rleal ia. Nait sian ra wol rleal roak ia ma nka'a wan roak. Ia ndoku ovu noru-neluk ni kadaravit roak, ba rbobar.
41005016	Tamata ovi rarea brana i lolin roak ia yai, ti rfamalik ne, Yesus naling vatuk roak nait sian ra tali tamata i nait sian ra rleal ia, ma ti rna'a vavu dur isa.
41005017	Ba rera lablobang verin Yesus ma nti talik warira yai.
41005018	Ba Yesus mane nrata kumal ralan, na brana i lan a nait sian ra rleal ia, nera verin Yesus ma novu vali.
41005019	Na'uk Yesus wol ntorung ma novu, ma nfalak verin ia ne, “Ni lolin a, mewal a'uk oa muti mu ahu a, ma fwamalik verin mu rahan teta na'a Duila'a Ni afa lolin ovi notu munuk roak verin oa, ovu Ni silobang i nfaturu roak verin oa.”
41005020	Ba brana yai nti wan i naran Dekapolis ma nfamalik na'a afa lolin ovi Yesus notu verin ia, ma tamata ovi rarenar ra rtalkaka munuk.
41005021	Yesus navul kumal ma netal ewal nti danau ni lihir a. Na'a danau yai nelan a, tamata rivun rma ma rdir-lilit Ia.
41005022	Tamata dawan isa, naran Yairus. Ia nban-ulu na'a Yahudi rira rahan falurut a. Ia nma ma nsi'ik Yesus, na nsangatur ma nsoak wahan a na'a Yesus wahan ralan a,
41005023	ma nera ovu ralan urun ne, “Baba, yanak vata nawar ma dawan ia, ma sarseri ma nmata. Fara mwa ma mlobang ia ma fwadoku limam na'a tenan a, boma deka nmata!”
41005024	Ba Yesus irua Yairus rti, na tamata rivun ila'a rorang Ia, ba tamata avyai rsidekin ira.
41005025	Tali tamata rivun avyai, na vata isa laran nvoat ma dawan da'in, ti naran varat vutu rahin irua roak.
41005026	Vata yai ni vava'at wol lolin lahir, ovu nala munuk roak ni metan ra al nbahir dokter ra, na'uk nawar watan ia ovu ntafal ma aleman.
41005027	Ia nrenar roak ne, Yesus notu ma lolin ewal tamata ra, ba na'a tamata rivun fruarira ra, na vata yai nahu Yesus murin nma ma nebang Ia, ma nkena Ni ravit blawat a.
41005028	Ia nanovak na'a ralan a ne, “Fara ukena watan Ni ravit blawat a, na veka lolin ewal ya'a!”
41005029	Na'ut i nkena Yesus Ni ravit blawat a, na brian munuk laran i nvoat a ntalik lahir, ba ia nfarnuang ne, lolin ewal ia tali ni suhut a.
41005030	Na'ut inyai lahir, na Yesus a nka'a ne, Ni ngrebat a ntali tenan nti ma notu ma tamata suhut ra lolin ewal ira. Ba nfulak Ia na'a tamata rivun avyai fruarira ma norat ira ne, “Iki nkena Ning ravit blawat i?”
41005031	Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rfalak ne, “Bapa ka'i msi'ik watan, tamata rivun rdir-lilit Oa, ba rdekin kena Oa, na'uk morat watan obin ne, ‘Iki nkena Ya'a?’ ”
41005032	Na'uk Yesus nsi'ik lilit ira obin al ndava tamata i nkena Ia.
41005033	Vata yai nka'a roak ne lolin roak ia, ba nbobar ma raruru ia, ma nma ma nsangatur na'a Yesus wahan ralan a, ma nfamalik verin Ia na'a afakataka munuk.
41005034	Ba Yesus nfalak verin vata yai ne, “Titi, morang Ya'a, ba lolin roak oa! Lolin roak oa, ba mewal oa, ovu fara Ubu nala Ni malinan verin oa.”
41005035	Na'ut i Yesus nangrihi obin, na Yairus i nban-ulu na'a Yahudi rira rahan falurut yai, ni tamata ifira rtali ni rahan rma. Ira rfalak verin Yairus ne, “Itrana, yanam vata nmata roak, ba deka fwafrea Tuan Guru.”
41005036	Na'uk Yesus nafena ma nrenar afa ovi rfalak ra, ba nfalak verin Yairus ne, “Deka bwobar, ba morang watan Ya'a!”
41005037	Yesus wol ntorung ma tamata rivun avyai rban-orang Ia, na'uk ntorung watan ma Petrus, Yakobus irua warin a Yohanes rovu Ia.
41005038	Ti ma raran Yairus ni rahan, na Yesus nsi'ik rahan ralan a vangoa-vanga, ovu rvakar al rfaktanit ma vair dawan.
41005039	Yesus nti ralan ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Afakinimi vangoa-vanga ovu byakar i? Kasiko'u yai wol nmata, na'uk ntub-lufa watan!”
41005040	Ira rmalit waweang Yesus, ba Ia nsinir ira ma rti murin. Ia novun kasiko'u yai renan ovu yaman a, ntafal vali tamata itelu ovi rorang Ia ma rti wan i kasiko'u yai ntuba a.
41005041	Yesus ntaha kasiko'u yai liman a ma nfalak verin ia ne, “Talita kum.” Faliak ini ihin a ne, “Titi, ufalak verin oa ma bwatar kikyai!”
41005042	Kasiko'u yai nva'at ewal ma nbatar lahir ma nbana. Ia ni varat vutu rahin irua. Tamata ovi rsi'ik afa i Yesus notu yai rtalkaka urun i lahir!
41005043	Na'uk Yesus nfalak teri lahir ma deka rfaivar verin iki watan na'a afa i notu a. Ia nfalak munuk wean inyai, na nsinir ira ma rala afamtahan ma kasiko'u yai na'an.
41006001	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rti talik wan yai, ma rti Ni ahu.
41006002	Na'ut amar i Yahudi ra ryari ira, na Yesus nsiair na'a rira rahan falurut. Tamata rivun rarenar afa ovi nfalak ra, na rtalkaka. Ba rsiforat ira ne, “Ia nka'a afa avyai tali inba? Ia Ni kaka'a ntali iki? Iki nala ngrebat ini verin Ia ma not-nala mujizat ra?
41006003	Ia tukan kayu Ia. Renan naran Maria ovu warin ra verin Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas ovu Simon. Uran ra rleal vali ini.” Tamata rivun avyai ralar sian Ia, ba rafena ma rorang Ia.
41006004	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Tamata ra ralang nabi isa na'a wan inba watan, na'uk wol ralang ia na'a ni ahu, ovu na'a ni rahan teta, ovu ni tiniman ra wol ralang vali ia.”
41006005	Yesus wol notu mujizat na'a inyai, tevek wol rorang Ia. Na'uk nfadoku liman nana'a tamata ifira watan ovi rira suhut ra, ma lolin ewal ira.
41006006	Yesus nabrian, tevek wol rorang Ia. Nata Yesus nban-lilit ahu ovi rna'a wan yai, ma nsiair.
41006007	Na'ut inyai, na Ia nasdovu Ni tamata vutu rahin irua ovi rorang Ia, beti nsinir ma raruan ira rti, ovu nala Ni ngrebat verin ira ma raling vatuk nait sian ra tali tamata ra.
41006008	Yesus nsurak ira ma nfalak ne, “Deka mtyaha afa rivun na'a bira banbanan, ba mtyaha watan bira takil ra. Deka mtyaha kesi, sadawan, ovu vali kubang.
41006009	Mya'adoru tatea ra na'a eabira ra, na'uk deka mtyaha ravit blawat, nlia tali isa.”
41006010	Ia ntafal ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Wean i miti rahan isa, na mnya'a inyai, ti naran i mane miti talik wan yai.
41006011	Wean i tamata ovi rna'a ahu isa wol rtorung ma mnya'a inyai, ovu vali wol rarenar bira vaivatul ra, na byan-talik wan yai. Misnabar vatuk kyavu tali eabira ra, boma neluk faneak ne, Ubu veka nukun ira.”
41006012	Ba Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rti rfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin verin tamata ra, boma rahil ma rtalik tali rira salasilan ra.
41006013	Ira raling vatuk nait sian rivun tali tamata ra. Raslofi vali ngul na'a tamata rivun ovi rira suhut ra, ma lolin ewal ira.
41006014	Raja Herodes nrenar roak afa ovi Yesus notu ra, tevek tamata rivun rka'a roak naran a. Tamata boku rfalak ne, “Yohanes i nbaptis tamata ra nva'at ewal roak tali matmatan a, ba ia ni ngrebat ma not-nala mujizat ra.”
41006015	Na'uk tamata liak boku rfalak ne, “Ia ini nabi Elia.” Boku rfalak vali ne, “Yesus yai nabi Ia, wean nabi lalan ra.”
41006016	Herodes nrenar afa ovi tamata ra rfamalik yai, na nfalak ne, “Wahal, inyai Yohanes i usinir tamata ra ma rvangal ia nva'at ewal roak!”
41006017	Herodes nala roak warin i Filipus awan a naran Herodias ma neluk awan, ba Yohanes nfalak lalawatan verin ia ne, “Wol bisma msifa ovu ia, tevek motu wean inyai, na mangal roak Ubu Ni inukun ra!” Afa i Yohanes nfalak yai notu ma Herodias ntonan mane nfedan ia, na'uk wol not-nala, tevek Herodes nalang Yohanes ovu nka'a ne, ni vava'at a nmalola ovu wol ni salasilan lahir. Velik ne afa ovi Yohanes nfalak yai rotu ma Herodes ralan raruan, na'uk inan ma nrenar watan. Herodes nfalak ma rtaha Yohanes ma rkeak ia ma ti rfadoku ia na'a bu'i ralan a. Notu wean inyai tevek awan a, na'uk nsinir tamata ovi rna'a bu'i ralan a ma rwanar Yohanes.
41006021	Ti nata Herodias ndav-nala roak linga'an mane nfedan Yohanes. Na'ut inyai, na Herodes notu ni snoba ma al nfangnanang ni amar vulan kena. Ia nasdovu munuk ni dawan fareta ra, dawan suldadu ra, ovu vali tamata dawan ra na'a propinsi Galilea.
41006022	Herodias yanan vata nti snoba ralan ma nso'i-nsomar. Ba notu ma raja Herodes ovu ni mangun ra inar urun. Herodes nfalak verin vata mnelat yai ne, “Mera afaka watan tali ya'a, na veka ala verin oa!”
41006023	Ia nafwaba lahir verin vata yai ne, “Mera afaka watan tali ya'a, na veka ala verin oa, velik ne wang i ufareta ni lihir vali, veka ala watan verin oa.”
41006024	Ba vata yai nti murin ma norat renan ne, “Veka era afaka tali ia?” Renan nfalak ne, “Mera Yohanes i nbaptis tamata ra, ulun a.”
41006025	Nata vata yai newal lahir ia ma ti nfalak verin Herodes ne, “Era ma fwadoku Yohanes i nbaptis tamata ra, ulun a, na'a binan dawan isa ma mala verin ya'a.”
41006026	Herodes nrenar afa i vata yai nfalak a, na ralan lalau urun, na'uk wol nala'ing nala roak afa i vata yai nera, tevek nafwaba roak ma ni mangun ra rarenar.
41006027	Ba Herodes nsinir lahir suldadu isa ma ti nfedan Yohanes, ma nala ulun a verin ia. Suldadu yai nti bu'i ralan ma nvangal Yohanes ulun a.
41006028	Ia nfadoku Yohanes ulun a na'a binan dawan isa, beti rala verin vata mnelat yai, ma ntaha ti verin renan a.
41006029	Ti ma Yohanes ni tamata ovi rorang ia rarenar ne nmata roak, na rti ma rala tbunan a ma ti rfanuba na'a van isa ralan a.
41006030	Yesus Ni tamata ovi lan nsinir ira ma rti rfamalik Ubu Ni vaivatul ra rewal ira ma ti rtuan Ia. Ira rfamalik munuk afa ovi rotu ra, ovu vali rira afa ovi rair ra verin Ia.
41006031	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Mya ma did tinemun tati wan lean vu isa ma myari kedan mia.” Ia nfalak wean ini, tevek tamata ra rma ma rtuan lalawatan ira, ma wol rafna'an ovu wol rot-nala akataka vali.
41006032	Ba aksa ira ravul kumal rti wan lean vu isa.
41006033	Tamata rivun rarea ira rti, na ref nala ira, ma tamata avyai rtali ahu munuk na'a wan yai rafla watan rahu raa ma raran lan, beti Yesus ovu Ni tamata ra raran.
41006034	Ti ma Yesus nsuta tali kumal ma nda, na nsi'ik tamata rivun avyai. Ia nfaturu Ni silobang verin ira, tevek ira wean domba ovi wol duarira. Nata nair afa rivun verin ira.
41006035	Lera nakduvul ma laflofan roak, ba Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rma rtuan Ia ma rfalak ne, “Wol tamata rleal wan lean vu ini, ovu vali lera sian roak,
41006036	ba msinir ira ma rti ahu ovi sarseri ma rfaha afamtahan ma ra'an.”
41006037	Na'uk Ia nfalak verin ira ne, “Mia musti fya'an ira!” Ira rfalak verin Ia ne, “Ba ami musti amfaha roti fyawan dinar ratut irua ma amfa'an tamata rivun ovi?”
41006038	Ba Ia norat ira ne, “Bira roti ifira? Eka miti ma msyi'ik.” Ira rti ma rsi'ik, ma rewal ira ma rfalak ne, “Roti ilima ovu ian irua.”
41006039	Yesus nsinir tamata avyai munuk ma rotu rira sidovung ma rdoku ngrova yanat ratarira ra.
41006040	Ba tamata rivun avyai rdoku na'a sidovung ra, ma tali sidovung avyai, na boku tamata vatvutun lamliman, boku vali ratratut sasan.
41006041	Yesus nala roti ilima ovu ian irua yai, beti ntadata nrata lanit ma nfalak fara weninyai verin Ubu. Ia notu munuk wean inyai, beti nvisul roti avyai ma nala verin Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia, boma rti rsiduk verin tamata rivun avyai. Nvisul vali ian irua yai ma rsiduk verin tamata ra munuk.
41006042	Ira rir tinemun rafna'an ma evurira ra rveda munuk roak,
41006043	beti Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rasdovuk munuk roti teran ovu ian teran avyai na'a ahir vutu rahin irua rngora.
41006044	Tali tamata ovi ra'an roti ovu ian avyai, brana ra watan rivun ilima.
41006045	Yesus nsinir lahir Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ma ravul kumal yai, ma ula ira rti ahu Betsaida na'a danau Galilea ni lihir a. Ia nana'a wan yai obin ma nsinir tamata rivun avyai ma rewal ira.
41006046	Ti ma tamata rivun avyai rsilyaha, beti Yesus nva'al vuar ma naflurut.
41006047	Ti ma ovan roak, na Ni tamata ra rna'a kumal yai ma rti raran roak danau ni fruan a, na aksa Ia na'a da obin.
41006048	Yesus nsi'ik ira rvahi ma nawar ira, tevek nait a dawan nangal ira. Ka'a bi nfada'ing amar roak, beti Yesus nbana na'a wear ratan ma norang ira, ovu notu mane nbana lia ira.
41006049	Na'uk ti ma rarea Ia nbana na'a wear ratan, na rnarin ne nitu ngran Ia, ba rafwak,
41006050	tevek ira munuk rarea Ia ovu rbobar urun i lahir. Na'uk Ia nfalak lahir verin ira ne, “Ralabira ra deka kako'u, tevek ini Ya'a, ba deka byobar!”
41006051	Yesus nrata kumal yai ma ntuan ira, na nait ntalik lahir. Ira rabrian munuk,
41006052	tevek wol rka'a Yesus Ni dawan obin. Velik ne rsi'ik roak Ia nfamela roti ovu ian ra, na'uk ralarira rasmotak watan.
41006053	Ira ravul kumal yai ma retal nala roak danau Galilea, ma rda raran ngur tavun i rfanara ia ne Genesaret, ma rfalau rira kumal a.
41006054	Rsuta tali kumal yai, na brian munuk, tamata ra ref-nala lahir Yesus.
41006055	Ba tamata ra rban-lilit lahir wan yai, ma rfaivar verin tamata ra ne, Yesus nana'a wan yai. Nata, tamata ovi wol rira suhut ra rvara ovi rira suhut ra na'a rira dari ra, ma rti wan inba watan ovi rarenar ne, Yesus nana'a.
41006056	Na'a wan inba watan Yesus nma, na'a ahu te kota te wan liak, ira rovun tamata ovi rira suhut ra rti wan i rfedi-rfaha afa na'a. Nata tamata ovi rira suhut ra rvakar al rera verin Ia ne, “Fara mtorung ma amkena watan mu ravit a blawat ni wahan a.” Ba tamata ovi rkena Ia, lolin munuk ira.
41007001	Amar isa, na tamata boku tali Yahudi rira sidovung isa naran Farisi, ovu boku vali tali Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Ubu Ni inukun ra, rtali Yerusalem rma ma rtuan Yesus.
41007002	Tamata Farisi ra ovu tamata Yahudi liak ra munuk rorang ma dawan adat ovi rtali uburir-nusirira ra. Adat avyai rfalak ma raraming limarira ra beti rafna'an, wean tamata isa newal ia tali wan i rfedi-rfaha afa na'a, na nliru ia ma nmerat veki, beti nafna'an. Ira rorang vali inukun rivun tali uburir-nusirira ra, wean raraming rira ketal, kobi ovu afa ovi rala al rafva'ak ra ma rmerat. Tamata Farisi ra ovu Yahudi rira dawan avyai rsi'ik Yesus Ni tamata boku ovi rorang Ia rafna'an, na'uk wol rot-orang rira adat ma raraming limarira ra.
41007005	Ba ira mane rfasala Ni tamata ra ma rfalak ne, “Afakinimi Mu tamata ovi rorang Oa wol rorang dida adat ovi rtali ubud-nusid ra? Ira rafna'an, na'uk wol raraming limarira ra.”
41007006	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Mia ini wean lahir tamata ovi rfalak afa isa, na'uk rotu afa liak! Afa ovi lan ana, nabi Yesaya ntulis roak na'a Surat Ralan a, rfamalik lahir mia. Yesaya ntulis ne, ‘Tamata ovi rfadawang Ya'a ovu rira vaivatul ra, na'uk ralarira ra raroa tali Ya'a.
41007007	Ira raraning Ya'a, na'uk wol ihin lahir, tevek afa ovi rair ra wol rtali Ubu, na'uk rtali tamata!’
41007008	Mia wol myorang afa ovi Ubu nfareta ma myotu a, ba inabira ma myorang a'uk adat ovi tamata ra rotu.”
41007009	Yesus ntafal ma nfalak vali verin ira ne, “Mia mkya'a dalang ma mifena ma myorang afa ovi Ubu nfareta, ma myorang a'uk bira adat ra!
41007010	Lalan ana, Musa nfalak roak ne, ‘Myalang renabir-yamabira ra,’ ovu vali, ‘Tamata iki watan i nfalak sian renan te yaman a, na musti rfedan ia.’
41007011	Na'uk mia myair tamata Yahudi ra ne, wean i tamata isa nfalak verin renan te yaman a ne, ‘Mane ala afa boku verin mia ma al ulobang mia, na'uk ala roak verin Ubu, ma neluk ning korban verin Ia.’
41007012	Mia fyalak ne, lolin watan ma tamata yai wol nlobang renan te yaman a.
41007013	Ba wean inyai, na sala ma dawan mia. Mia wol fyabana roak Ubu Ni vaivatul ra, tevek myorang a'uk ububir-nusibira rira adat ra. Afa ovi wean inyai, mia myotu ma rivun obin.”
41007014	Nata Yesus nera ewal tamata rivun avyai ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Eka mryenar ma lolin afa ovi ufalak ra, boma mkya'a.
41007015	Afa ovi mian ra wol rfangra mia. Na'uk afa ovi rtali ralabira ra ka'i rfangra mia. [
41007016	Ba tamata iki watan tali mia inan ma nka'a Ning vaivatul ra, na eka nrenar ma lolin!”]
41007017	Nata Yesus nban-talik tamata rivun avyai ma nti rahan isa ralan a, na Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rorat Ia na'a vaivatul kamkuma i nfamalik a.
41007018	Ia nfalak verin ira ne, “Ba mia wol fyan-aran obin? Wol mkya'a ne, afa ovi rtali murin rti tamata evun ralan wol rot-nala ma ni vava'at wol nmalola na'a Ubu wahan ralan a.
41007019	Afamtahan wol nsuta tamata ralan a, na'uk nsuta evun a, beti ntimuri vatuk ia.” (Yesus nfalak wean ini ma nfaturu ne, bisma ta'an afamtahan afaka watan, ovu afamtahan ovi ta'an avyai wol rotu ma dida salasilan.)
41007020	Yesus ntafal ma nfalak ne, “Afa ovi rtali tamata ralan sa'i rfangra tamata rira vava'at ra.
41007021	Ba afa ovi rtali tamata ralan rotu ma tamata ra rfikir a'uk afa ovi sian ra. Ira rsifa tia ma watan ovu tamata ovi wol awarira verin ira, rbori, rsifedan,
41007022	tamata ovi rsifa roak, na'uk rtuba ovu tamata ovi wol awarira verin ira, tamata ovi inar ma rtafal ila'a rira metan ra, inar urun ma rot-visal tamata rira vava'at ra, rsiklabir sian, rorang rira ininan sian ra, rbo'itea tamata liak rira metan ra, rfalak sian tamata, rfakaratat tenarira ra, ovu vali rboda-rbadi.
41007023	Afa sian avyai munuk rtali tamata ralan ovu rotu ma ni vava'at a wol nmalola na'a Ubu wahan ralan.”
41007024	Yesus nban-talik propinsi Galilea ma nti wan i nfaseri kota Tirus. Ia nti rahan isa ralan a, ovu nafena ma tamata ra rka'a ne, nleal inyai. Na'uk wol nfonak nala tenan, tevek tamata rivun rka'a roak.
41007025	Na'ut inyai, na vata isa, nait sian nleal yanan vata ko'u a. Na'ut i nrenar afa ovi Yesus notu ra, na nma lahir ma nsangatur nulu Yesus.
41007026	Vata ini wol tamata Yahudi ia. Ia ntali wan isa naran Fenisia i na'a propinsi Siria. Ia nera lablobang verin Yesus ma naling vatuk nait sian tali yanan vata yai.
41007027	Yesus nfalak verin ia ne, “Wol lolin, wean i tala kasiko'u rira afamtahan ra ma tvatuk verin yaha ra ma ra'an.”
41007028	Vata yai nfalak verin Yesus ne, “Kena ta Duila'a, na'uk yaha ra ba'i ra'an kasiko'u rira afamtahan mumun ovi rleka na'a meja vavan.”
41007029	Ba Yesus nfalak verin ia ne, “Oa mu vaivatul ovi fwalak yai lolin, ba bisma mewal a'uk oa, tevek nait sian nti talik roak yanam vata.”
41007030	Vata yai newal ia nti naran ni rahan ma nsi'ik, na yanan ntuba ko'i ratan. Nait sian nti talik roak ia.
41007031	Nata Yesus nti talik Tirus ma nti kota Sidon, beti newal Ia nahu wan Dekapolis ma nti danau Galilea.
41007032	Tamata ra rovun brana isa nma ma ntuan Yesus. Brana yai nangrihi, na'uk ni vaivatul ra wol lyawan, ovu naktun. Ira rera lablobang verin Ia ma nfadoku liman na'a brana yai.
41007033	Ba Yesus novun ia ma rfaroa ira tali tamata rivun ovi rna'a inyai, ma na'adoru liman tanan ra rti brana yai arun ra, beti notu beran na'a liman a ma nkena brana yai earn a.
41007034	Nata ntadata nrata lanit ma nanak ma dodun, beti nfalak ne, “Efata!” Ihin ne: “Natvadil lahir!”
41007035	Brian munuk, na arun ra lolin lahir ma nafrenar, ovu earn maraan vali ma nangrihi ma lyawan roak.
41007036	Yesus nfalak teri tamata ovi rna'a inyai ma deka rfamalik afa yai verin tamata iki watan. Velik ne Yesus nfalak teri ira, na'uk rfamalik lalawatan afa yai na'a inba watan.
41007037	Tamata ra rtalkaka lahir ma rfalak ne, “Ya'i yo! Ia notu munuk afa ovi ma lolin buas, tevek notu ma tamata i naktun bisma nafrenar, ovu notu ma tamata i nmanu bisma nangrihi.”
41008001	Na'ut inyai, na tamata rivun ila'a rasdovu ira. Ira wol rira afamtahan ma ra'an, ba Yesus nera Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ma nfalak verin ira ne,
41008002	“Ufaturu Ning silobang verin tamata rivun ovi, tevek rorang Ya'a amar itelu roak, ovu wol rira afamtahan ma ra'an.
41008003	Wean i usinir ma rewal ira ovu evurira vu, na veka renweringun na'a linga'an ralan, tevek boku rtali raroa rma.”
41008004	Ira rfalak ne, “Na'a wan lean vu ini, na tala roti tali inba ma naran ma al tfa'an tamata rivun ovi?”
41008005	Yesus norat ira ne, “Bira roti ifira?” Ira rfalak ne, “Roti ifitu.”
41008006	Ia nsinir tamata rivun avyai ma rdoku lanun, beti nala roti ifitu yai ma naflurut ovu nfalak fara weninyai verin Ubu. Nata nvisul roti ra ma nala verin Ni tamata ra, ma ki rtanang verin tamata rivun avyai. Ba rtanang verin tamata rivun avyai.
41008007	Ira rira ian ko'u boku vali, ba Yesus naflurut ovu nfalak fara weninyai verin Ubu na'a ian avyai, beti nsinir Ni tamata ra ma rtanang vali ian avyai verin tamata ra.
41008008	Rafna'an ma evurira ra rveda roak, beti Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rasdovuk teran ra na'a ahir dawan ifitu rngora.
41008009	Tamata ovi rafna'an ini nlabas rivun ifa'at. Ba Yesus nsinir ira ma rewal ira,
41008010	beti Ia ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rarata lahir kumal isa ma rti wan i naran Dalmanuta.
41008011	Amar isa, na tamata Farisi boku rma ma rtuan Yesus, ma rsisoal ira ovu Ia. Ira rlabir teman Ia ma rera ma notu mujizat isa ma nfaturu ne, Ubu nsinir Ia.
41008012	Yesus nanak ma dodun, ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Afakinimi tamata ovi rva'at fiang ini rera ma otu mujizat? Afa i ufalak verin mia ini, kena urun! Ya'a veka wol otu mujizat verin mia!”
41008013	Nata nti talik ira ma nrata kumal ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia, ma retal danau yai rti ni lihir a.
41008014	Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rablufang ma rtaha roti rivun. Ira rtaha roti isa watan na'a kumal a.
41008015	Yesus nala vaivatul kamkuma al nsurak ira ne, “Msyi'ik ma lolin tamata Farisi ra ovu raja Herodes rira ragi a.”
41008016	Ira ka'i rsifalak afa verin ira ne, “Ia nfalak wean inyai, tevek wol dida roti.”
41008017	Yesus nka'a afa ovi rfalak ra, ba norat ira ne, “Notu afakinimi msyifalak afa na'a i wol mtyaha roti? Mia wol mkya'a ovu wol fyan-aran obin? Ralabira rangrebat da'in ma wol fyikir aran afa ini?
41008018	Matabira, na'uk wol msyi'ik? Arubira, na'uk wol mifrenar? Mia wol mingnanang ne,
41008019	amar i uvisul roti ilima verin tamata rivun ilima ma ra'an, ovu vali rasdovuk teran ra na'a ahir ifira?” Ira rfalak ne, “Ahir vutu rahin irua.”
41008020	Yesus norat ewal ira ne, “Amar i uvisul roti ifitu ma tamata rivun ifa'at ra'an, na misdovuk teran ra na'a ahir ifira?” Ira rfalak ne, “Ahir ifitu.”
41008021	Ia nfalak verin ira ne, “Notu afakinimi wol fyan-aran obin?”
41008022	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rbana ma raran ahu Betsaida, na tamata boku ovi rna'a ahu yai rovun brana isa i nkibu verin Ia, ma rera lablobang ma nkena tamata kibu yai, boma nsirea ewal.
41008023	Ba Yesus ntaha tamata kibu yai liman a ovu nfabana ia ma rti ahu murin. Nata nafnit na'a tamata yai matan a ovu nfadoku liman a na'a matan a, beti norat ia ne, “Msirea roak?”
41008024	Tamata yai ntadata ma nfalak ne, “Ya'a usi'ik tamata ra, na'uk wearira aa ra rbana.”
41008025	Ba Yesus nfadok-ewal liman a na'a tamata yai matan a, ma lolin roak ia ba nsirea urun, ma nsi'ik afa ra munuk ovu lyawan.
41008026	Tamata yai lolin roak ia, beti Yesus nsinir ma newal ia nti ni rahan, ovu nsurak ia ne, “Deka muti ahu ralan veki.”
41008027	Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rban-talik Betsaida ma rti ahu ovi rfaseri kota Kaisarea Filipi. Ira rna'a linga'an ralan obin, na Ia norat ira ne, “Tamata ra rfalak ne, Ya'a ini iki?”
41008028	Ira rfalak verin Ia ne, “Tamata boku rfalak ne, Oa ini Yohanes i nbaptis tamata ra. Boku rfalak ne, nabi Elia, ovu vali boku rfalak ne, tamata isa tali nabi ra.”
41008029	Ia norat ira ne, “Na'uk mia fyikir ne, Ya'a ini iki?” Petrus nfalak ne, “Oa ini Raja i mtevut mami salasilan ra!”
41008030	Ba Yesus nfalak teri lahir ma deka rfamalik afa yai verin tamata iki watan.
41008031	Tali amar yai, Yesus nair Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, “Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a, musti utuan susa rivun. Dawan Yahudi ra, ovu Yahudi rira dawan mela falurut ra ovu vali Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra veka rala'ing Ya'a ma rfedan Ya'a, na'uk amar itelu nelak, na Ubu veka nfava'at ewal Ya'a.”
41008032	Yesus nfalyawang lahir afa yai verin ira. Ba Petrus novun Ia ma rdir-aling ira, beti ntabu Ia.
41008033	Na'uk Yesus ndir-tamuri Ia, beti nfalak verin ia ne, “Nitdawan, muti vatuk oa tali ini! Afa ovi fwikir ra wol rtali Ubu, na'uk rtali watan tamata ra.”
41008034	Tamata rivun rna'a wan yai, ba Yesus nera ira ovu vali Ni tamata ra ma nfalak ne, “Tamata iki watan inan ma norang Ya'a, na ia musti nalak tenan a ovu nvara ni aa walwalur a. Notu wean inyai, beti bisma norang Ya'a.
41008035	Tamata iki watan inan ma ntahang teri ni vava'at i na'a lanit ivavan a, na ia veka wol ni vava'at kakiwal a. Na'uk tamata iki watan nmata tevek norang Ya'a, ovu nfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin a, na ia veka ni vava'at kakiwal a.
41008036	Wean i tamata isa nasdovu munuk metan ovi rna'a lanit ivavan a, na'uk wol ni vava'at kakiwal, na ihin aka?
41008037	Ia ki nala aka ma al nkati vava'at kakiwal? Wol nala akataka lahir!
41008038	Fiang ini, mlyeal tamata sian ovi rafena ma rorang Ya'a, fruarira ra. Na'uk tamata iki watan nma'it ma nfalak ne norang Ya'a, ovu wol ntorung afa ovi ufalak ra, na Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a, veka wol utorung vali tamata yai, na'ut i uma ewal a ovu Yamang vanan i nfitik nyadat a, ovu vali Ubu Ni sansinir ovi rmerat urun tali lanit ratan.”
41009001	Ia ntafal ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Afa i ufalak verin mia ini, kena urun! Tali bir tinemun na'a wan ini, na boku wol rmata obin, na'ut inyai, na ira veka rsi'ik Ubu Ni Fareta nma ovu ngrebat!”
41009002	Ba amar inean nelak roak, na Yesus novun Petrus, Yakobus ovu Yohanes ma rva'al vuar karatat isa, ma aksa ira watan na'a inyai. Ira rsi'ik, na Yesus felan a naling roak ia.
41009003	Afa ovi nung a neluk ra, rangiar urun ma rfitik-ryadat. Wol tamata isa na'a lanit ivavan a veka ntof nala ma ravit ra rangiar wean inyai.
41009004	Brian munuk, na irtelu rsi'ik, na nabi Elia ovu nabi Musa rvotuk ma rangrihi nulu Yesus.
41009005	Ba Petrus nfalak verin Ia ne, “Tuan Guru, lolin urun ma tna'a wan ini. Ni lolin a amfadiri befak itelu, ma isa verin Oa, isa verin Musa, isa vali verin Elia.”
41009006	Velik aba, Petrus wol nka'a afa ovi nfalak ra, tevek irtelu rbobar urun, na'uk nangrihi watan wean inyai.
41009007	Na'ut inyai, na mutan isa nkum-teri ira, ovu rarenar vai isa ntali mutan ralan yai ne, “Ini Ya'a Yanak i ulobang urun Ia. Mryenar afa ovi nfalak ra!”
41009008	Brian munuk, na rsi'ik lilit wan yai, na wol tamata roak na'a inyai. Yesus a'uk sa'i nana'a inyai.
41009009	Nata rsuta tali vuar ma rna'a rira banbanan obin, na Yesus nsurak ira ne, “Deka fyamalik afa i mryea inlangin yai verin tamata ra veki. Mnyaban ma Ubu nfava'at ewal Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a ini tali matmatan, beti fyamalik.”
41009010	Ira rot-orang Ni snurak yai, na'uk ka'i rsiforat ira na'a Yesus Ni afa i nfalak a ne, “Veka uva'at ewal tali matmatan.”
41009011	Ba rorat Yesus ne, “Notu afakinimi Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra rfalak ne, Elia veka nma ula ia, beti Raja i ntevut mami salasilan ra?”
41009012	Yesus nfalak ne, “Kena, Elia nma ula ia, boma nasusan afakataka munuk. Na'uk mia mkya'a roak ne, rtulis na'a Surat Ralan ne, Ya'a, Tamata Yanan, veka utuan sian rivun ovu vali rangrihi visal-vasil Ya'a.
41009013	Ba ufalak verin mia ne, Elia nma roak, na'uk tamata ra ka'i rorang rira ininan ra ma rotu tia ma watan ia. Inyai kena lahir ovu vaivatul ovi lalan a rtulis roak na'a Surat Ralan a.”
41009014	Yesus, Petrus, Yakobus ovu Yohanes rtali vuar rsuta roak mane rasdovu ira ovu Yesus Ni tamata liak ovi rorang Ia. Ira rsi'ik, na tamata rivun ila'a rdir-lilit rira kida ra. Yahudi rira dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra, boku rsingarahi ovu ira.
41009015	Ti ma tamata rivun avyai rsi'ik Yesus, na rtalkaka munuk, ba rafla lahir rti ma rtuan Yesus.
41009016	Yesus norat ira ne, “Msyingarahi ovu ira na'a aka?”
41009017	Tali tamata rivun avyai, na tamata isa nfalak verin Yesus ne, “Tuan Guru, ya'a ovun yanak a brana nma verin Oa ma motu ma lolin ia, tevek nait sian nleal ia ma notu ma nmanu.
41009018	Wean i nait sian nlabir ia, na notu ma nvatuk tenan nsuta lanun, ovu vali bera faluvur ia, nifan ra rsitutu ira, ovu nablingu lahir. Era roak verin Mu tamata ovi rorang Oa ma raling vatuk nait sian yai, na'uk wol rot-nala.”
41009019	Ba Yesus nfalak verin Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia ne, “Wol bira inorang lahir! Amar ifira vali ma udoku ovu mia ma utahang nal ralang ovu mia, tamata ovi wol bira inorang a? Myovun kasiko'u yai mya ini!”
41009020	Ba rovun kasiko'u yai verin Yesus. Na'ut i nait sian yai nrea Yesus, na notu lahir ma kasiko'u yai tenan a raruru lalean ia, ovu nleka ma nlawar ia na'a lanun, ovu vali bera faluvur ia.
41009021	Yesus norat kasiko'u yai yaman a ne, “Nait sian ini nleal ia mnanat roak?” Yaman nfalak ne, “Tali ni kako'u roak!
41009022	Nait sian ini nleal ia ma nfaleka dalang ia na'a yafu ovu vali na'a wear mane nfedan ia. Ba wean i Oa bisma mlobang ia, na mlobang ma fwaturu Mu silobang verin ami!”
41009023	Yesus nfalak ne, “Oa fwalak ne, wean i bis ot-nala? Tamata i norang Ubu ovu ralan urun veka not-nala afakataka munuk lahir!”
41009024	Kasiko'u yai yaman nafwak lahir ne, “Ya'a orang, na'uk ning inorang a kako'u obin, ba mlobang ya'a ma mtafal ning inorang verin Oa!”
41009025	Yesus nsi'ik, na tamata rivun rma roak, ba nfalak ne, “Hoi, nait sian oa, ovu motu tamata ra ma raktun ovu rmanu. Ufareta ma muti talik kasiko'u ini, ovu deka mewal kikyai oa ma mleal ia.”
41009026	Nait sian yai nafwak ovu notu ma kasiko'u yai raruru lalean ia, ma nleka nsuta ntuba wean tamata matmatan roak, beti nait sian nti ntalik ia. Ba tamata rivun avyai rfalak ne, “Ia nmata roak.”
41009027	Na'uk Yesus ntaha kasiko'u yai liman a ma nfadiri ia ma ndiri.
41009028	Nata Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia sa'i rna'a rahan, beti rorat Ia ne, “Afakinimi ami wol amaling nala nait sian yai?”
41009029	Yesus nfalak ne, “Nait sian i wean inyai, wol bisma mila'ing ia, wean i wol miflurut.”
41009030	Ira rti talik wan yai ma rban-oli propinsi Galilea. Yesus nafena ma tamata ra rka'a ne, ira rna'a inyai,
41009031	tevek Ia nair Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia. Yesus nair ira ma nfalak ne, “Tamata ra veka rala Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a ini, verin tamata ra ma rfedan Ya'a, na'uk amar itelu nelak, na uva'at ewal”
41009032	Na'uk Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia wol rfan-aran afa ovi nfalak ra, ovu rbobar ma wol rorat Ia na'a afa avyai.
41009033	Rewal ira rti Kapernaum, na rti rahan isa ralan a. Yesus norat ira ne, “Inlangin a na'a linga'an, na vaibira na'a afaka?”
41009034	Wol rfalak akataka verin Ia, boma deka nka'a, tevek inlangin a rsitaku ulurira na'a rira fikiran ra ma rdava ne, iki dawan lia munuk tali ira.
41009035	Yesus ndoku ma nera Ni tamata vutu rahin irua ma nfalak ne, “Iki mane dawan lia munuk ia, na nfakabava tenan veki ma neluk sansinir ovu nlobang tamata ra munuk.”
41009036	Nata Yesus nala kasiko'u isa ma nfalak ma ndiri waharira ralan ra. Yesus nangabuk kasiko'u yai ma nfalak verin ira ne,
41009037	“Tamata iki watan nalang kasiko'u ra wean kasiko'u ini tevek narang a, na ia nalang roak Ya'a. Tamata iki watan nalang Ya'a, na wol nalang watan Ya'a, na'uk nalang roak Ubu i nsinir Ya'a.”
41009038	Yohanes nfalak verin Yesus ne, “Tuan Guru, ami amsi'ik tamata isa nala naram a ma naling vatuk nait sian tali tamata, ba amtab-teri ia, tevek wol ntali mami sidovung.”
41009039	Yesus nfalak ne, “Deka mtyab-teri ia, tevek wol tamata isa bisma nala narang a ma notu mujizat, beti nangrihi lahir ma nfalak sian Ya'a.
41009040	Tamata iki watan wol nangal ita, na ia nlobang roak ita.
41009041	Afa i ufalak verin mia kena urun! Tamata iki watan nala wear gelas isa ma myenu tevek myorang Kristus, na Ubu veka naval ia na'a ni rala lolin a.”
41009042	“Na'uk tamata iki watan notu ma kasiko'u i norang Ya'a nleka ma notu salasilan, na Ubu veka nukun ia. Ni lolin a rkeak vatu dawan isa na'a relan a, ma relik ia na'a tahat ralan.
41009043	Wean i limabira lihir notu ma myotu salasilan, na myetal vatuk ia. Ni lolin a, bira vava'at kakiwal ovu Ubu, velik ne limabira lihir watan, tevek wol lolin lahir ma miti yafwan kakiwal ovu limabira irua. [
41009044	Na'a wan yai yafu wol nmat-nala, ovu bwa ovi ra'an matmatan ra wol rmat-nala vali.]
41009045	Wean i eabira lihir notu ma myotu salasilan, na myetal vatuk ia. Ni lolin a, bira vava'at kakiwal ovu Ubu, velik ne eabira lihir watan, tevek wol lolin lahir ma miti yafwan kakiwal ovu eabira irua. [
41009046	Na'a wan yai, na bwa ovi ra'an matmatan ra wol rmat-nala ovu yafu wol nmat-nala vali.]
41009047	Wean i matabira lihir notu ma myotu salasilan, na mkyivul vatuk ia. Ni lolin a, ti mnya'a Ubu Ni Fareta, velik ne matabira lihir watan, tevek wol lolin lahir ma nvatuk mia na'a yafwan kakiwal ovu matabira irua.
41009048	Na'a wan yai, na yafu wol nmat-nala ovu bwa ovi ra'an matmatan ra wol rmat-nala vali.
41009049	Yafu veka notu ma tamata ovi rorang Ubu rmerat.
41009050	Sira lolin, na'uk wean i wol sarsiran roak, na myotu wean inba ma sarsiran ewal? Fara bira vava'at lolin, wean afamtahan ovi rtafal sira ma lanun. Deka vaibira na'a iki dawan lia munuk, ba msyiotu lolin watan mia, boma bira vava'at ra malinan.”
41010001	Yesus ndir-talik ahu Kapernaum ma nti Propinsi Yudea na'a oar Yordan ni lihir a. Tamata rivun rma ewal ma rdir-lilit Yesus ma nair ira, wean i ba'i nsiair a.
41010002	Tamata Farisi boku rma ma rlabir teman Ia, ma rorat Ia ne, “Na'a dida agama ni inukun ra, na brana i nsifa roak bisma ntalik awan te wahal?”
41010003	Ba Yesus norat ira ne, “Musa nfareta aka verin mia na'a ni inukun ra?”
41010004	Ira rfalak ne, “Musa ntorung verin brana ra ne, wean i brana isa mane ntalik awan a, na ia nasusan ni surat sitalik, beti nfasuka ia.”
41010005	Yesus nfalak verin ira ne, “Musa nala ni inukun yai verin mia, tevek ralabira ra rangrebat da'in.
41010006	Tevek na'ut i Ubu notu lanit ivavan a, na Ia notu vali brana ovu vata.
41010007	Wean inyai, bi brana veka nsuta talik renan ovu yaman a, ma irua awan a rleal isa.
41010008	Vata irua brana ralarira isa ma ikisa watan ira. Ba irua ikisa watan roak.
41010009	Wean inyai, bi Ubu notu roak ma irua rleal isa, ba tamata ra wol bis rotu ma rsitalik.”
41010010	Nata Yesus ovu Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rti rahan ralan ewal ma rorat Yesus na'a afa avyai.
41010011	Yesus nfalak ne, “Brana iki watan i ntalik awan a ma nsifa ewal ovu vata liak, na ia naflidan roak, ba notu sala roak verin awan lan a.
41010012	Wean vali inyai verin vata ra. Vata iki watan i ntalik awan a ma nsifa ovu brana liak, na ia naflidan vali.”
41010013	Tamata ra rovun yanarira rma verin Yesus, boma nfadoku liman na'a ira, na'uk Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rangrova tamata avyai.
41010014	Yesus nsi'ik afa yai, na nangrova ma nfalak verin ira ne, “Msyi'ik watan ma kasiko'u avyai rma ma rtuan Ya'a. Deka myotu teri ira, tevek tamata ovi wearira avyai, ira veka warira vali ovu Ubu na'a Ni Fareta a.
41010015	Afa i ufalak verin mia ini, kena urun! Tamata iki watan wean i wol norang wean kasiko'u avyai ne, Ubu nfareta tamata ra wean lahir Raja, na ia veka wol wan na'a Ubu Ni Fareta a.”
41010016	Ba Yesus nangabuk kasiko'u avyai ovu nfadoku liman nana'a ira ma naflahar ira.
41010017	Yesus mane nti roak, na brana isa nafla nma ma nsangatur nulu Ia ma norat ne, “Tuan Guru, lolin Oa. Ya'a musti otu afaka, boma ning vava'at kakiwal?”
41010018	Yesus norat ia ne, “Afakinimi fwalak ne lolin Ya'a? Wol tamata isa vali lolin ia, Ubu a'uk sa'i lolin Ia.
41010019	Oa mka'a munuk afa ovi Ubu nfareta roak verin ita. Deka msifedan, wean i msifa roak, na deka mtuba ovu tamata i wol awam verin ia, ovu deka bwori. Deka mdiri fareta waharira ralan ra ma msiklabir na'a afa ovi fwalak ra na'a tamata liak, deka fwaruki tamata liak ra ovu malang renam ovu yamam a.”
41010020	Tamata yai nfalak ne, “Tuan Guru, ya'a ot-orang munuk roak afa avyai, tali na'ut i ning kako'u obin.”
41010021	Yesus nsi'ik, na nlobang ia ma nfalak ne, “Teran afa isa wol motu obin. Muti ma fwedi munuk mu metan ra, ma mtanang kubang avyai verin tamata kasian ra. Motu wean inyai, na veka mu metan na'a lanit ratan, beti mwa ma morang Ya'a.”
41010022	Ti ma nrenar afa i Yesus nfalak yai, na wahan aleman ma newal ia ovu ralan lalau, tevek ni metan rivun.
41010023	Yesus nsi'ik lilit Ni tamata ra, na nfalak verin ira ne, “Susa buas ma tamata ovi rka'i ra rtorung ma Ubu nfareta ira wean lahir Raja!”
41010024	Yesus Ni tamata ra rarenar Ni vaivatul ra, na rtalkaka. Ba Yesus nfalak ewal verin ira ne, “Baba averi, veka susa buas ma tamata ovi rka'i ra rtorung ma Ubu nfareta ira wean lahir Raja.
41010025	Susa ma afwatan dawan isa naran unta nuruk nala dirin ni bilahin a, na'uk susa lia munuk verin tamata ovi rka'i a ma ti rna'a Ubu Ni Fareta a.”
41010026	Tamata ovi rorang Yesus rtalkaka lahir ma rsiforat ira ne, “Ba wean inyai, na iki veka ni vava'at kakiwal?”
41010027	Yesus nsi'ik ira ma nfalak ne, “Tamata ra wol rot-nala lahir afa yai, na'uk wol wean inyai verin Ubu, tevek Ia bis not-nala munuk akataka.”
41010028	Petrus nfalak verin Yesus ne, “Ami amban-talik roak mami afakataka munuk ma amorang Oa!”
41010029	Yesus nfalak ne, “Afa i ufalak verin mia ini, kena urun! Tamata iki watan i nban-talik ni rahan teta a, a'an a warin ra, renan ovu yaman a, uran a yanan ra, te ni va'i ra ma norang Ya'a ovu nfamalik Ubu Ni Ivar Lolin a, na
41010030	fiang ini Ubu veka nal-ewal ma ntafal ma faratut ni rahan teta, a'an a warin, uran a yanan ra, renan ra, ovu vali ni va'i ra, na'uk veka rotu sian ia vali, tevek norang Ya'a. Na'uk amar ovi veka rma ini, na ia veka ni vava'at kakiwal.
41010031	Na'uk tamata rivun ovi fiang ini dawan ira ma rban-ulu verin tamata ra, ira veka rban-muri watan. Tamata ovi ko'u watan ira fiang ini ma rban-muri, ira veka dawan ira ma rban-ulu verin tamata ra.”
41010032	Ira rva'al rarata Yerusalem, na Yesus nbana ula Ia. Yesus Ni tamata ovi rorang Ia rtalkaka, ovu vali tamata ovi rban-orang ira rbobar. Ia nera Ni tamata vutu rahin irua ovi rorang Ia yai ma rti nelan kedan a, ma nfamalik verin ira na'a afa ovi tamata ra veka rotu verin Ia.
41010033	Yesus nfalak ne, “Fiang ini mane tati Yerusalem, na Ya'a, Tamata Yanan Ya'a ini, veka rala Ya'a ti ma una'a dawan mela falurut ra ovu dawan ovi rair Musa ni inukun ra limarira ralan ra. Ira veka rukun Ya'a ma umata, boma rala Ya'a verin tamata ovi wol Yahudi ra.
41010034	Tamata avyai veka rlabir waweang Ya'a ovu rira vaivatul ra, rafnit Ya'a, rasveva Ya'a, beti rfedan Ya'a. Na'uk ti ma amar itelu nelak, na veka uva'at ewal.”
